translated: because they will waste their time in conceptualization.

original: rab tu byed pa las kyang /🔽zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra bar ni //
analyzed: rab tu byed pa las kyang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra bar ni //
translated: And in the Pradipoddyotana,🔽it is said:🔽One should see one's mind

original: rang gi sems ni blta bar bya //
analyzed: rang gi sems ni blta bar bya //
translated: as like the disk of the moon.

original: gal te zla ba la dmigs nas //
analyzed: gal te zla ba la dmigs nas //
translated: If one focuses on the moon,

original: rdo rje mtshan @82b ma rtog par byed //
analyzed: rdo rje mtshan @82b ma rtog par byed //
translated: The vajra sign is to be imagined.

original: bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis //
translated: For the yogis of the creation stage,

original: rdo rje la sogs thabs ston yin //
analyzed: rdo rje la sogs thabs ston yin //
translated: the vajra and so forth are taught as methods.

original: zla rdo rje sogs sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: zla rdo rje sogs sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the union of the moon, vajra, and so forth,

original: sems dang sems byung yang dag phrad //
analyzed: sems dang sems byung yang dag phrad //
translated: mind and mental factors meet perfectly.

original: thabs dang shes rab kun sbyor bas //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab kun sbyor bas //
translated: The union of method and wisdom

original: lha yi sku ni bskyed par 'gyur //
analyzed: lha yi sku ni bskyed par 'gyur //
translated: gives rise to the deity’s form.

original: phyag rgya bzhi pos rgyas btab cing //
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi pos rgyas btab cing //
translated: Sealed with the four mudras,

original: lha yi nga rgyal 'dzin pa ste //
analyzed: lha yi nga rgyal 'dzin pa ste //
translated: one maintains the divine pride.

original: bskyed rim rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i //
analyzed: bskyed rim rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i //
translated: The yogi who possesses the yoga of the creation stage

original: rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu spyod //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu spyod //
translated: always practices in this way.

original: dpal ldan 'dus pa la sogs las //
analyzed: dpal ldan 'dus pa la sogs las //
translated: In the glorious Guhyasamaja and so forth,

original: de dang der ni rgya cher gsungs //
analyzed: de dang der ni rgya cher gsungs //
translated: this is taught extensively here and there.

original: ji srid bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor 'gyur //
analyzed: ji srid bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor 'gyur //
translated: As long as the yoga of meditation is not attained,

original: de srid las ni dang po la //
analyzed: de srid las ni dang po la //
translated: one is in the first stage of action.

original: de ni yongs su rdzogs pa yi //
analyzed: de ni yongs su rdzogs pa yi //
translated: Then, when that is fully perfected,

original: rnal 'byor yang ni brtan par bya //
analyzed: rnal 'byor yang ni brtan par bya //
translated: the yoga is also stabilized.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ste bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ste bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: And so forth. This is the creation stage.

original: de bzhin du a'a zhes pa ni snang ba mtha' yas dang mi bskyod pa dang don yod grub pa ste gsum mo //
analyzed: de bzhin du a'a zhes pa ni snang ba mtha' yas dang mi bskyod pa dang don yod grub pa ste gsum mo //
translated: Likewise, the letter A is the three, Amitābha, Akṣobhya, and Amoghasiddhi.

original: dza zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad do ;
analyzed: dza zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad do ;
translated: The letter Ja is Vairocana.

original: / rgya ni rin chen 'byung ldan te /
analyzed: / rgya ni rin chen 'byung ldan te /
translated: The letter Ḍha is Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: de rnams kyi ngo bo rin chen lnga ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi ngo bo rin chen lnga ste /
translated: Their nature is the five jewels,

original: bshang ba la sogs pa bdud rtsi lnga'o //
analyzed: bshang ba la sogs pa bdud rtsi lnga'o //
translated: the five nectars such as feces.

original: de rnams smad pa ni nyan thos pa dang pha rol pa rnams so //
analyzed: de rnams smad pa ni nyan thos pa dang pha rol pa rnams so //
translated: Those are despised by the śrāvakas and the tīrthikas.

original: de dag blang zhing spyod nas phyi nas kyang snang ba'o //
analyzed: de dag blang zhing spyod nas phyi nas kyang snang ba'o //
translated: Having taken and enjoyed them, they are also visible.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'grub par mi 'gyur ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub las nye bar mi 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'grub par mi 'gyur ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub las nye bar mi 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
translated: Therefore, one will not succeed, one will not be close to the mundane and supramundane accomplishments, is what is taught.

original: dam tshig rnams ni mi sbyor bas //
analyzed: dam tshig rnams ni mi sbyor bas //
translated: Not applying oneself to the pledges,

original: zhes bya ba'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: one attains the root downfalls.

original: de ni sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de ni sgrub pa'o //
translated: That is the practice.

original: da ni spros pa dang bcas pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni spros pa dang bcas pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the elaborate [practice] will be explained.

original: srog gcod pa'i sems can gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: srog gcod pa'i sems can gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: As for “the sentient being who kills,” and so on,

original: srog gi nye bar mtshon pa'i lus ni srog ste /
analyzed: srog gi nye bar mtshon pa'i lus ni srog ste /
translated: the life is the body that is the instrument of life.

original: de nyid gcod pa ni tha mal pa'i ngo bo spangs la rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo nyid du bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid gcod pa ni tha mal pa'i ngo bo spangs la rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo bo nyid du bya ba'o //
translated: Killing it is abandoning its ordinary nature and making it the nature of Vairocana.

original: smra ba ni ngag ste de nyid kyang tha mal pa'i bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa'i sgra brjod pa'i ngo bo ste /
analyzed: smra ba ni ngag ste de nyid kyang tha mal pa'i bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa'i sgra brjod pa'i ngo bo ste /
translated: Speech is the voice, and it is the expression of the sounds of ordinary vases, cloth, and so on.

original: de la brdzun du byed pa ni de nyid kyi ngo bo spangs la snang ba mtha' yas nyid du bya'o //
analyzed: de la brdzun du byed pa ni de nyid kyi ngo bo spangs la snang ba mtha' yas nyid du bya'o //
translated: Lying is abandoning that nature and making it the nature of Amitābha.

original: gzhan gyi nor ni rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi ngo bo yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi nor ni rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi ngo bo yin te /
translated: The wealth of others is the nature of the eight consciousnesses.

original: de nyid 'phrog pas sna tshogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa ldog pa ni mi bskyod pa nyid du bya ba la chags pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid 'phrog pas sna tshogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa ldog pa ni mi bskyod pa nyid du bya ba la chags pa'o //
translated: Stealing it is turning away from the various afflictions and branch afflictions and being attached to the nature of Akṣobhya.

original: gang zhig rnal 'byor pa @83a * //
analyzed: gang zhig rnal 'byor pa @83a * //
translated: As for “the yogi/nī who engages in sexual union,”

original: rnams tha mal pa'i lus ngag yid stong pa nyid la zhugs te /
analyzed: rnams tha mal pa'i lus ngag yid stong pa nyid la zhugs te /
translated: the yogi/nī enters into the emptiness of the ordinary body, speech, and mind.

original: zla ba dang rdo rje la sogs pa'i rim gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'i ngo bo nyid du byed pa'o //
analyzed: zla ba dang rdo rje la sogs pa'i rim gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'i ngo bo nyid du byed pa'o //
translated: By the stages of the moon, vajra, and so on, one makes the nature of the seal of the Tathagata.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: And likewise,🔽those who always enjoy the pleasures,

original: rtag tu 'dod pa spyad gang dang // zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rtag tu 'dod pa spyad gang dang // zhes bya ba la /
translated: here,

original: 'dod par bya zhing spyod pas na 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod par bya zhing spyod pas na 'dod pa ste /
translated: the pleasures are to be enjoyed and used,

original: lha mo spyan la sogs pa dang gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: lha mo spyan la sogs pa dang gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'o //
translated: such as the goddesses Locana and so on, and Rupavajrā and so on.

original: de dag spyad pa ni sngar bshad pa'i rim pas /
analyzed: de dag spyad pa ni sngar bshad pa'i rim pas /
translated: The enjoyment of those is, by the previously explained stages,

original: sum brtsegs la sogs pa'i rol pa'i khang par gnas shing /
analyzed: sum brtsegs la sogs pa'i rol pa'i khang par gnas shing /
translated: dwelling in the pleasure house of the triple-stacked and so on,

original: sna tshogs pa'i me tog la sogs pas brgyan pa'i /
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i me tog la sogs pas brgyan pa'i /
translated: adorned with various flowers and so on,

original: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig tu 'dod chags chen po'i ting nge 'dzin nyams su myong zhing byang chub sgrub par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig tu 'dod chags chen po'i ting nge 'dzin nyams su myong zhing byang chub sgrub par byed pa'o //
translated: together with Vajrayoginī, experiencing the meditative stabilization of great passion, and accomplishing enlightenment.

original: de bzhin du bshang gci zas su za ba ni phan tshun bdud rtsi lnga nye bar spyod pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du bshang gci zas su za ba ni phan tshun bdud rtsi lnga nye bar spyod pa ste /
translated: And likewise, eating feces and urine is the mutual enjoyment of the five nectars,

original: sbyang ba la sogs pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: sbyang ba la sogs pa'i rim pas so //
translated: by the stages of purification and so on.

original: de rnams kyang snod du gyur pa ni snod du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyang snod du gyur pa ni snod du gyur pa'o //
translated: Those who are vessels are vessels.🔽Whose?

original: gang gi zhe na bsgrub pa yi //
analyzed: gang gi zhe na bsgrub pa yi //
translated: Of the practice.

original: zhes pa ni spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa'o //
translated: This is the conduct with elaboration.

original: de bskyed pa'i rim pa dang sgrub pa dag ste /
analyzed: de bskyed pa'i rim pa dang sgrub pa dag ste /
translated: The generation stage and the practice are

original: spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa'o //
analyzed: spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa'o //
translated: the conduct with elaboration.

original: de bzhin srog ces bya ba'i rlung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin srog ces bya ba'i rlung ste /
translated: Likewise, the so-called life-force wind

original: snying gnas langs nas kha dang sna dag las 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: snying gnas langs nas kha dang sna dag las 'byung ba'o //
translated: arises from the heart and emerges from the mouth and nose.

original: de lta bu'i 'khor bar ltung bar byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa bcu gcod par byed pa ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pas 'od gsal ba'i go 'phang la zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pa gang yin pa de ni srog gcod pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i 'khor bar ltung bar byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa bcu gcod par byed pa ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pas 'od gsal ba'i go 'phang la zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pa gang yin pa de ni srog gcod pa'o //
translated: The yogin who enters the stage of clear light by means of the stage of vajra repetition, who cuts off the ten life-force winds that cause one to fall into cyclic existence in that way, is the killer of life.

original: de bzhin du smra zhing bstan pa ni brgya drug cu'i dbye bas gang zhig de ni smra ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du smra zhing bstan pa ni brgya drug cu'i dbye bas gang zhig de ni smra ba ste /
translated: Likewise, the one who speaks and teaches, who is the one with the one hundred and sixty divisions, is the speaker.

original: rang bzhin rnams so //
analyzed: rang bzhin rnams so //
translated: The natures.

original: de rnams brdzun du byed pa ni spong ba la /
analyzed: de rnams brdzun du byed pa ni spong ba la /
translated: The one who makes them false is the renouncer.

original: gang zhig dga' ba ni chags pa ste /
analyzed: gang zhig dga' ba ni chags pa ste /
translated: The one who delights is the one with attachment.

original: sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams so //
analyzed: sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams so //
translated: The yogis of the stage of the pure mind.

original: gzhan gyi nor ni 'od gsal ba ste /
analyzed: gzhan gyi nor ni 'od gsal ba ste /
translated: The wealth of others is the clear light.

original: de nyid 'phrog pa ni de las cig car du sgyu ma'i sku blang ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid 'phrog pa ni de las cig car du sgyu ma'i sku blang ba ste /
translated: To steal it is to take the illusory body from it all at once.

original: gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams so //
analyzed: gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams so //
translated: The yogis of the stage of self consecration steal the wealth of others.

original: de bzhin du rtag tu ni dus mtshams dang / mtshan mo dang nyin mo'i dbye bas so //
analyzed: de bzhin du rtag tu ni dus mtshams dang / mtshan mo dang nyin mo'i dbye bas so //
translated: Likewise, always, by the division of the periods, nights and days.

original: 'dod pa ni 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'dod chags bar pa rnams la spyod pa ni rnam par dag par @83b byed pa la nus pa dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa ni 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'dod chags bar pa rnams la spyod pa ni rnam par dag par @83b byed pa la nus pa dang ldan pa ste /
translated: To enjoy desire is to enjoy passion, passionlessness and the middle passion, and to be able to purify it.

original: mngon par byang chub kyi rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams so //
analyzed: mngon par byang chub kyi rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams so //
translated: The yogis of the stage of manifest enlightenment.

original: de bzhin du mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ting nge 'dzin la dmigs te /
analyzed: de bzhin du mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ting nge 'dzin la dmigs te /
translated: Likewise, one should focus on the samadhi of nonabiding nirvana.

original: gang zhig 'jig rten la grags pa'i bshad gci dang rdzas tha mi dad par shes pa de ni bshad gci zas su zab ste /
analyzed: gang zhig 'jig rten la grags pa'i bshad gci dang rdzas tha mi dad par shes pa de ni bshad gci zas su zab ste /
translated: He who knows that excrement and urine are not different from the substances well known in the world, eats excrement and urine as food.

original: yongs su rdzogs pa'i zung 'jug gi rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams te /
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs pa'i zung 'jug gi rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams te /
translated: They are the yogis of the stage of complete union.

original: de dag sgrub pa 'di la rnam pa gsum gyi spyod pa brtan par byed pa'i theg pa la 'grub par 'gyur ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid du 'gyur ba zhig slob bzhin ma yin par 'grub bo //
analyzed: de dag sgrub pa 'di la rnam pa gsum gyi spyod pa brtan par byed pa'i theg pa la 'grub par 'gyur ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid du 'gyur ba zhig slob bzhin ma yin par 'grub bo //
translated: They are established in this practice, in the vehicle which stabilizes the three kinds of conduct, and they become Great Vajradhara without training.🔽And in the Samputa Tantra, it says,

original: rab tu byid pa las kyang zung 'jug ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas /
analyzed: rab tu byid pa las kyang zung 'jug ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas /
translated: Having remained in the samadhi of union,

original: slar ni gang la'ang mi slob po zhes 'byung ste /
analyzed: slar ni gang la'ang mi slob po zhes 'byung ste /
translated: one does not train in anything again.

original: rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang / sems rnam par dag pa dang / bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang / mngon par byang chub pa dang / zung 'jug gi rim pa rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang / sems rnam par dag pa dang / bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang / mngon par byang chub pa dang / zung 'jug gi rim pa rnams so //
translated: They are the stages of vajra repetition, mind purification, self consecration, manifest enlightenment, and union.

original: spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa bstan nas spros pa med pa'i spyod pa bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa bstan nas spros pa med pa'i spyod pa bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: Having explained the elaborate conduct, in order to explain the unelaborate conduct,

original: ma dang sring mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ma dang sring mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, “mother, sister,” and so on.

original: ma ni lha mo spyan gyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: ma ni lha mo spyan gyi rang bzhin no //
translated: The mother is the nature of the goddess Locanā.

original: sring mo ni m'a ma k'i'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: sring mo ni m'a ma k'i'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The sister is the nature of Māmakī.

original: bu mo ni gos dkar mo'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: bu mo ni gos dkar mo'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The daughter is the nature of Pāṇḍaravāsinī.

original: ngang gi sgras ni lha mo sgrol ma'i rang bzhin tsha mo yin te /
analyzed: ngang gi sgras ni lha mo sgrol ma'i rang bzhin tsha mo yin te /
translated: The sister’s daughter is the nature of the goddess Tārā.

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya ma de rnams blangs la nags tshal la sogs par 'bras bu la sogs pa ci snyed par za zhing /
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya ma de rnams blangs la nags tshal la sogs par 'bras bu la sogs pa ci snyed par za zhing /
translated: Having taken those pledge consorts, one should eat as much as one likes, such as fruit, in a forest, and so on.

original: de nyid mnyes par byas nas /
analyzed: de nyid mnyes par byas nas /
translated: Having pleased them,

original: sgrub pa ni rig ma'i brtul zhugs can rnal 'byor pas dngos grub rgya chen po ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa ni rig ma'i brtul zhugs can rnal 'byor pas dngos grub rgya chen po ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob pa'o //
translated: the adept, the practitioner who is engaged in the conduct of the awareness consort, will attain the great power, the power of the great seal.

original: theg pa chen po ni nags tshal du mchog ni rdzu 'phrul gyi khyad par can /
analyzed: theg pa chen po ni nags tshal du mchog ni rdzu 'phrul gyi khyad par can /
translated: The Great Vehicle is the forest. The supreme is the special power.

original: chos ni spyod pa gang la yod pa de ni theg chen mchog gi chos nyid de /
analyzed: chos ni spyod pa gang la yod pa de ni theg chen mchog gi chos nyid de /
translated: He who has the Dharma, i.e., the practice, has the supreme Dharma of the Mahayana.

original: nags tshal gyi lha mo rnams so //
analyzed: nags tshal gyi lha mo rnams so //
translated: The goddesses of the forest.

original: de rnams la bza' ba rnyed nas dngos grub kyi skal ba dang ldan par gyur pa ste rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang sgrub pa dag go //
analyzed: de rnams la bza' ba rnyed nas dngos grub kyi skal ba dang ldan par gyur pa ste rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang sgrub pa dag go //
translated: Having found food from them, he becomes endowed with the fortune of success, i.e., the perfection stage and the practice.

original: yang na ma ni lkog ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //🔽sring mo ni snying ga'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: yang na ma ni lkog ma'i dkyil 'khor ro // sring mo ni snying ga'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Or else, mother is the mandala of the throat.🔽Sister is the mandala of the heart.

original: bu mo ni lte ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: bu mo ni lte ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: Daughter is the mandala of the navel.

original: ngang gi sgras ni tsha mo yin te gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //🔽dkyil 'khor de dag gang gis mnyes pa ni dmar po @84a * //
analyzed: ngang gi sgras ni tsha mo yin te gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro // dkyil 'khor de dag gang gis mnyes pa ni dmar po @84a * //
translated: The word “also” refers to the niece, i.e., the secret mandala.

original: la sogs pa'i 'od zer gyis ting nge 'dzin gyi nang gi bdag nyid kyi dus la goms par byed pa des ni dngos grub ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub dang / rgya chen ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: la sogs pa'i 'od zer gyis ting nge 'dzin gyi nang gi bdag nyid kyi dus la goms par byed pa des ni dngos grub ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub dang / rgya chen ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: He who pleases those mandalas with the light rays of red, etc., and who is habituated to the inner nature of samadhi, he attains the success of peace, etc., and the great success of the Mahamudra.

original: theg chen ni g-yon dang g-yas kyi sna khung gnyis so //
analyzed: theg chen ni g-yon dang g-yas kyi sna khung gnyis so //
translated: The Great Vehicle is the two nostrils, left and right.

original: de nyid kyi mchog gi chos ni g-yas pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba'i spro pa ste de las thob par 'gyur te rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi mchog gi chos ni g-yas pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba'i spro pa ste de las thob par 'gyur te rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: The supreme Dharma of that is the expansion of the division of the right and so forth, which is attained from that, the stage of vajra repetition.

original: yang na ma ni chos kyi sku'o //
analyzed: yang na ma ni chos kyi sku'o //
translated: Or else, mother is the dharmakāya.

original: sring mo ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: sring mo ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
translated: Sister is the saṃbhogakāya.

original: bu mo ni sprul ba'i sku'o //
analyzed: bu mo ni sprul ba'i sku'o //
translated: Daughter is the nirmāṇakāya.

original: sgrub pa pos ni rnal 'byor pas stong pa nyid dang / dbus kyi gtso bo dang / dkyil 'khor ba'i rnam pas sku gsum gyi bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gang gis mnyes pa ni sgom par byed pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa pos ni rnal 'byor pas stong pa nyid dang / dbus kyi gtso bo dang / dkyil 'khor ba'i rnam pas sku gsum gyi bdag nyid dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gang gis mnyes pa ni sgom par byed pa'o //
translated: The practitioner, the yogī, by whom the maṇḍala wheel, which is the nature of the three bodies by way of the aspects of emptiness, the central principal, and the maṇḍala retinue, is pleased, meditates.

original: des dngos grub rgya chen te rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des dngos grub rgya chen te rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: By that, one attains the great power, the power of Vajrasattva.

original: theg chen ni stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: theg chen ni stong pa nyid do //
translated: The Great Vehicle is emptiness.

original: mchog ni zla ba dang rdo rje sa bon bkod pa'o //
analyzed: mchog ni zla ba dang rdo rje sa bon bkod pa'o //
translated: The supreme is the placement of the moon and vajra seed.

original: chos ni sku rdzogs pa la sogs pa'i bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: chos ni sku rdzogs pa la sogs pa'i bsgom pa'o //
translated: The Dharma is the meditation of the complete body, and so forth.

original: de lta bur grub par bya'o zhes ston te /
analyzed: de lta bur grub par bya'o zhes ston te /
translated: Thus, it is taught: One should accomplish it in that way.

original: dang po sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog dang las rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin rnams dang spros pa med pa'i spyod pa'o //
analyzed: dang po sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog dang las rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin rnams dang spros pa med pa'i spyod pa'o //
translated: The first is the yoga, the samadhis of the supreme victory mandala and the supreme victory of karma, and unelaborated conduct.🔽In order to explain the extremely unelaborated conduct,

original: shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: it is said:

original: sangs rgyas gtso bo'i yum dag la //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gtso bo'i yum dag la //
translated: The supreme buddhas are the mothers,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so forth.

original: sangs rgyas kyi yum ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i ngo bo ye shes kyi phyag rgya ma'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yum ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i ngo bo ye shes kyi phyag rgya ma'o //
translated: The mother of the buddhas is the wisdom paramita, the nature of the jnana mudra consort.

original: de nyid gtso bo ni snying ga las spros te /
analyzed: de nyid gtso bo ni snying ga las spros te /
translated: That very supreme one is emanated from the heart.

original: mnyes par byas pa ni rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsgom zhing mi gos pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma rnams kyis mi reg pa'o zhes ston to //
analyzed: mnyes par byas pa ni rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsgom zhing mi gos pa ni rnam par rtog pa'i dri ma rnams kyis mi reg pa'o zhes ston to //
translated: Pleased is taught to mean that the perfect yogi meditates, and unstained means that one is not touched by the stains of conceptuality.

original: de lta bu bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas sangs rgyas 'grub par 'gyur ba ni mngon par byang chub kyi go 'phang thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bu bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas sangs rgyas 'grub par 'gyur ba ni mngon par byang chub kyi go 'phang thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: The yogin who meditates in this way will attain buddhahood, will attain the state of manifest enlightenment.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: rnam par mi rtog ces pa ni snga ma bzhin du gnyis su med pa'i bsgom pa la gnas pas so //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog ces pa ni snga ma bzhin du gnyis su med pa'i bsgom pa la gnas pas so //
translated: As before, by abiding in nonconceptual meditation, in nondual meditation.

original: khyi la sogs pa las khyad par bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: khyi la sogs pa las khyad par bstan par bya ste /
translated: He should show the difference from dogs, etc.

original: blo can zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyi bsgom pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: blo can zhes bya ba ni thabs dang shes rab kyi bsgom pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa ste /
translated: The wise one, endowed with the meditation of means and insight, etc.,

original: shes rab dang bcas pas so zhes ston to //
analyzed: shes rab dang bcas pas so zhes ston to //
translated: teaches that he is endowed with insight.

original: des ni 'di @84b bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: des ni 'di @84b bshad pa yin te /
translated: He explains this:

original: gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba la sogs pa'i rtog pa spangs pa'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pas rang gi snying ga las rnal 'byor ma spros te /
analyzed: gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba la sogs pa'i rtog pa spangs pa'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pas rang gi snying ga las rnal 'byor ma spros te /
translated: The yogin of the perfection stage, who has abandoned the concepts of pure and impure, etc., emanates yoginis from his heart.

original: gnyis su med pa'i spyod pas rnam par rtog pa med cing bsam gtan gyi bza' ba can de srid du bsgom par bya ste ji srid du mngon par byang chub kyi go 'phang thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i spyod pas rnam par rtog pa med cing bsam gtan gyi bza' ba can de srid du bsgom par bya ste ji srid du mngon par byang chub kyi go 'phang thob par 'gyur te /
translated: One should meditate for as long as one has not attained the state of manifest enlightenment, with the conduct of nonduality, without discursive thought, and with the food of meditative concentration.

original: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa dag dang / shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa dag dang / shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa'o //
translated: The generation and perfection stages, and the extremely unelaborate conduct.

original: yang na sangs rgyas ni kha phye ba'i padma'o //
analyzed: yang na sangs rgyas ni kha phye ba'i padma'o //
translated: Or else, the Buddha is the open lotus.

original: yum ni de nyid kyi rtsa dbus ma ste 'dod pa'i gdugs so //
analyzed: yum ni de nyid kyi rtsa dbus ma ste 'dod pa'i gdugs so //
translated: The consort is the central channel of that, the parasol of desire.

original: mnyes par bya ba ni de nyid 'gags shing byang chub kyi sems 'dzin te /
analyzed: mnyes par bya ba ni de nyid 'gags shing byang chub kyi sems 'dzin te /
translated: The pleasing is the retention of the bodhicitta by the cessation of that.

original: mi gos pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dri mas reg par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi gos pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dri mas reg par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The unstained is not touched by the stains of discursive thought of desire and so forth.

original: rnal 'byor pa des ni sangs rgyas ni lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba 'grub par 'gyur ba ni rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa des ni sangs rgyas ni lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba 'grub par 'gyur ba ni rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: The yogi/nī will accomplish the Buddha, the bliss of the innate, which is perfected.

original: ji lta bu zhe na rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na rnam par mi rtog pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: How so? It is said, “nonconceptually.”

original: rnam par rtog pa ni dpe'i lhan cig skyes pa ste de las 'das pas so //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa ni dpe'i lhan cig skyes pa ste de las 'das pas so //
translated: The imagination is the example of the innate, since it is beyond that.

original: blo ni dpe las byung ba'i lhan cig skyes pa ste /
analyzed: blo ni dpe las byung ba'i lhan cig skyes pa ste /
translated: The mind is the example of the arisen innate.

original: de nyid gang la yod pa de ni blo can te /
analyzed: de nyid gang la yod pa de ni blo can te /
translated: He who has that is a wise man.

original: sgrub pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pas sangs rgyas rnyed par mi dka'o zhes tshig gi don te de ni 'bras bu'o ;
analyzed: sgrub pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pas sangs rgyas rnyed par mi dka'o zhes tshig gi don te de ni 'bras bu'o ;
translated: The meaning of the words is that it is not difficult for the great practitioner to find Buddhahood, which is the result.

original: / yang na sangs rgyas ni khams gsum pa'o //
analyzed: / yang na sangs rgyas ni khams gsum pa'o //
translated: Or else, Buddha is the three realms.

original: yum ni de nyid kyi yum ste yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i bdag nyid yi ge'i phyi ma'o //
analyzed: yum ni de nyid kyi yum ste yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i bdag nyid yi ge'i phyi ma'o //
translated: The mother is the mother of that, the last syllable, which is the nature of the forty-nine syllables.

original: de nyid bud med dang skyes pa dang ma ning gi rang bzhin gyi yi ge gsum gyis nye bar bsdus la /
analyzed: de nyid bud med dang skyes pa dang ma ning gi rang bzhin gyi yi ge gsum gyis nye bar bsdus la /
translated: That is summarized by the three syllables, which have the nature of female, male, and neuter.

original: mnyes par bya ba ni 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis zo chun gyi 'khrul 'khor bzhin du bzlas pas ngag gi bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi phyi rol gyi rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mnyes par bya ba ni 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis zo chun gyi 'khrul 'khor bzhin du bzlas pas ngag gi bzlas pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi phyi rol gyi rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The pleasing is the pleasing of the mind, which is not defiled by external imaginations, which have the nature of the repetition of the voice, by means of the repetition of the wheel of syllables, like a waterwheel, by means of the process of engagement and so forth.

original: ji srid sangs rgyas ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: ji srid sangs rgyas ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: Buddha is Great Vajradhara.

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i bzlas pa'i rim pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i bzlas pa'i rim pas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: He is accomplished by the stage of repetition of Vairochana, etc.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How is it?

original: rnam par mi rtog ces pa ni yan lag ma nyams pa'i bzlas pas so //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog ces pa ni yan lag ma nyams pa'i bzlas pas so //
translated: Non-conceptual means by the repetition of the limbs.

original: blo can ni nyin mo dang mtshan mo nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'i bzlas pas so zhes ston /
analyzed: blo can ni nyin mo dang mtshan mo nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'i bzlas pas so zhes ston /
translated: The wise one means the one who repeats twenty-one thousand six hundred times by day and by night.

original: de ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de ni rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the stage of vajra repetition.

original: yang na sangs rgyas ni rnam @85a * //
analyzed: yang na sangs rgyas ni rnam @85a * //
translated: Or else, Buddha is the three consciousnesses.

original: par shes pa gsum gyi yum ni 'od gsal ba'i rnag bzhin shes rab ste /🔽de nyid ma nyes par bya ba ni rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i sgo nas bsgom zhing /
analyzed: par shes pa gsum gyi yum ni 'od gsal ba'i rnag bzhin shes rab ste / de nyid ma nyes par bya ba ni rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i sgo nas bsgom zhing /
translated: The mother is the clearlight transparency, the nature of wisdom.🔽That very one is to be made faultless by cultivation through the door of natural purity.

original: mi gos pa ni rang bzhin gyis byas pa'i skyon gyi dri ma rnams kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi gos pa ni rang bzhin gyis byas pa'i skyon gyi dri ma rnams kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Unstained means not harmed by the stains of faults made by nature.

original: ji srid rnal 'byor pa des sangs rgyas ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi snang ba dang / rnam par mi rtog pa ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi snang ba ste /
analyzed: ji srid rnal 'byor pa des sangs rgyas ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi snang ba dang / rnam par mi rtog pa ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi snang ba ste /
translated: As long as the yogi sees the Buddha as the appearance of the moon disc and non-conceptuality as the appearance of the sun disc,

original: blo can zhes pa ni zla ba dang nyi ma'i snang ba med pa'i 'od gsal ba'i snang ba 'grub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: blo can zhes pa ni zla ba dang nyi ma'i snang ba med pa'i 'od gsal ba'i snang ba 'grub par 'gyur te /
translated: he is a wise man, and the appearance of clear light without the appearance of the moon and sun will be accomplished.

original: sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the stage of the purification of mind.

original: yang na sangs rgyas kyi yum ni 'od gsal ba kho na'o //
analyzed: yang na sangs rgyas kyi yum ni 'od gsal ba kho na'o //
translated: Or else, the mother of the Buddha is clear light alone.

original: de mnyes par bya ba ni de nyid las cig car du sgyu ma lta bu'i sku spros par byas shing /
analyzed: de mnyes par bya ba ni de nyid las cig car du sgyu ma lta bu'i sku spros par byas shing /
translated: To please her is to emanate the illusory body from that alone, all at once.

original: mi gos pa ni spros pa dang bcas pa'i bsgom pas dbang du bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mi gos pa ni spros pa dang bcas pa'i bsgom pas dbang du bya ba ma yin no //
translated: To be unstained is not to be mastered by meditation with elaboration.

original: 'on kyang dri za'i grong khyer la sogs pa'i sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyi lha'i sku la dmigs te /
analyzed: 'on kyang dri za'i grong khyer la sogs pa'i sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis kyi lha'i sku la dmigs te /
translated: However, one should focus on the divine body with the twelve examples of illusion, such as the city of gandharvas,

original: khams gsum pa yang de nyid kyi ngo bor blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: khams gsum pa yang de nyid kyi ngo bor blta bar bya'o //
translated: and one should see the three realms as having the nature of that.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas ni rus pa dang sha la sogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sku rnal 'byor des 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas ni rus pa dang sha la sogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sku rnal 'byor des 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the yogi/nī will accomplish the wisdom body of the Buddha, which is devoid of bones, flesh, and so forth.

original: rnam par mi rtog ni zla ba dang rdo rje la sogs pa'i bsgom pa dang bral bas so //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog ni zla ba dang rdo rje la sogs pa'i bsgom pa dang bral bas so //
translated: Non-conceptual means free from the meditation on the moon, vajra, and so forth.

original: de bzhin du blo ni spros pa med pa'i shes rab ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du blo ni spros pa med pa'i shes rab ste /
translated: Likewise, mind is non-elaborate wisdom.

original: de nyid gang la yod pa de ni blo can rnal 'byor pa ste bdag ba byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid gang la yod pa de ni blo can rnal 'byor pa ste bdag ba byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: One who has that is a wise yogi/nī, the stage of self-consecration.

original: de bzhin du sangs rgyas yum ni 'dod chags la sogs pa spong bas de kho na nyid bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du sangs rgyas yum ni 'dod chags la sogs pa spong bas de kho na nyid bzhi pa'o //
translated: Likewise, the mother of the buddhas is the fourth reality, since it abandons attachment and so forth.

original: mnyes par bya ba ni snang ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis de nyid la goms par byas shing /
analyzed: mnyes par bya ba ni snang ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis de nyid la goms par byas shing /
translated: Pleased means familiarized with that reality through the stages of appearance and so forth.

original: mi gos ba ni rnam par rtog pa rags pa rnams kyis bsten par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi gos ba ni rnam par rtog pa rags pa rnams kyis bsten par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Unstained means not attended by coarse conceptuality.

original: ji srid sangs rgyas te mngon par byang chub des 'grub par 'gyur ba ni bskyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji srid sangs rgyas te mngon par byang chub des 'grub par 'gyur ba ni bskyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: As long as the buddhas, that is, manifest enlightenment, are accomplished, that is, generated.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: rnam par mi rtog ni ril por 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas so //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog ni ril por 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas so //
translated: Non-conceptual is endowed with the samādhi of grasping the whole.

original: blo can ni rjes su gzhig pa'i gtso bor gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa ste mngon par byang chub kyi rim pa'o //
analyzed: blo can ni rjes su gzhig pa'i gtso bor gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa ste mngon par byang chub kyi rim pa'o //
translated: The wise one is the yogi who is the principal of subsequent destruction, the stage of manifest enlightenment.

original: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi yum ni bden pa gnyis tha mi dad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi yum ni bden pa gnyis tha mi dad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: Likewise, the mother of the buddhas is the samādhi that has the characteristic of the non-difference of the two truths.

original: mnyes par bya ba ni @85b de nyid la brten nas mi gos pa ni bram ze gdol ma la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis reg par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mnyes par bya ba ni @85b de nyid la brten nas mi gos pa ni bram ze gdol ma la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis reg par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: To please is to be unstained by that very thing, not to be touched by the concepts of brahmins, outcasts, and so forth.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pas grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pas grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: For that very reason, the Buddha becomes accomplished through non-abiding nirvāṇa.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: Non-conceptual is the vajra-like samādhi.

original: blo ni kun du 'od kyis ste gang la yod pa de ni blo can te sangs rgyas kyis thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas so zhes ston te /
analyzed: blo ni kun du 'od kyis ste gang la yod pa de ni blo can te sangs rgyas kyis thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas so zhes ston te /
translated: The one who has the mind is the yogi who has attained Buddhahood.

original: zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: This is the stage of union.

original: de bzhin du yum ni shes rab bo //
analyzed: de bzhin du yum ni shes rab bo //
translated: Likewise, the mother is wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas ni rnal 'byor pa ste dang po'i don grub pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni rnal 'byor pa ste dang po'i don grub pa'o //
translated: The Buddha is the yogi who has accomplished the first meaning.

original: gtso bo ni gnyi ga yang shin tu bslab pa'o //
analyzed: gtso bo ni gnyi ga yang shin tu bslab pa'o //
translated: The principal one is the training in both.

original: mnyes par bya ba ni yang dag par sbyor bar byas shing /
analyzed: mnyes par bya ba ni yang dag par sbyor bar byas shing /
translated: The pleasing is the correct application.

original: mi gos pa ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis mi gzung ba'o //
analyzed: mi gos pa ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis mi gzung ba'o //
translated: The unstained is not grasped by the conceptual thoughts of the sravakas and so forth.

original: de ltar na bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed yang dag par sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
analyzed: de ltar na bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed yang dag par sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
translated: Thus, the yogi who is endowed with the correct application of the object of attainment and the means of attainment

original: nye bar bsgrub pa la sogs pa'i phyi ma'i bya ba rnams kyi sangs rgyas ni rnam par mi rtog pa nyid dang / blo can ni nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nye bar bsgrub pa la sogs pa'i phyi ma'i bya ba rnams kyi sangs rgyas ni rnam par mi rtog pa nyid dang / blo can ni nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: will attain the Buddhahood of the later activities such as the near attainment and so forth, and the wisdom of the one who has the mind, which is endowed with the wisdom of the penetrator.

original: de ni rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de ni rang bzhin no //
translated: That is the nature.

original: yum ni padma'o //
analyzed: yum ni padma'o //
translated: The mother is the lotus.

original: sangs rgyas ni rdo rje'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni rdo rje'o //
translated: The Buddha is the vajra.

original: de dag mnyes par bya ba ni yang dag par sbyor zhing mi gos pa ni yid kyis smod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de dag mnyes par bya ba ni yang dag par sbyor zhing mi gos pa ni yid kyis smod par mi bya'o //
translated: One should please them by means of union, and not be defiled by mentally disparaging them.

original: 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin du de rgyu'o //
analyzed: 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin du de rgyu'o //
translated: One should accomplish, etc., as before.

original: yum ni yi ge h'um ngo //
analyzed: yum ni yi ge h'um ngo //
translated: The mother is the syllable hūṃ.

original: sangs rgyas ni yi ge phat do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni yi ge phat do //
translated: The Buddha is the syllable phaṭ.

original: de dag char rengs pa'i phyir gtso bo'o //
analyzed: de dag char rengs pa'i phyir gtso bo'o //
translated: They are the chief because they are the cause of the rain of the bodhicitta.

original: mnyes par bya ba ni de dag dgod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i bskyod pa byas shing mi gos pa ni dga' ba dang bral bar mi bya ste byang chub kyi sems spro bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: mnyes par bya ba ni de dag dgod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i bskyod pa byas shing mi gos pa ni dga' ba dang bral bar mi bya ste byang chub kyi sems spro bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should please them by means of the shaking that precedes their emission, and one should not be defiled by being separated from the joy, that is, by emitting the bodhicitta.

original: gzhan ni snga ma bzhin du'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni snga ma bzhin du'o //
translated: The rest is as before.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: bha ga ra ling+ga rab zhugs nas //
analyzed: bha ga ra ling+ga rab zhugs nas //
translated: Having entered the bhaga and the liṅga,

original: byang chub sems gnas 'gro mi bya //
analyzed: byang chub sems gnas 'gro mi bya //
translated: one should not emit the bodhicitta.

original: dga' ba de nyid 'khrugs nas ni //
analyzed: dga' ba de nyid 'khrugs nas ni //
translated: Having disturbed that very joy,

original: sems ni gang zhig bsgom par bya //
analyzed: sems ni gang zhig bsgom par bya //
translated: one should meditate on the mind.

original: byang chub kyi sems spro ba ni //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems spro ba ni //
translated: The emission of bodhicitta

original: ji srid sngags pas mi bya ste //
analyzed: ji srid sngags pas mi bya ste //
translated: is not to be done by the mantrin

original: dga' skyes bde ba gang yang rung //
analyzed: dga' skyes bde ba gang yang rung //
translated: as long as there is any kind of pleasure arisen from passion,

original: de srid rgyun ma chad par thob //
analyzed: de srid rgyun ma chad par thob //
translated: as long as that is uninterrupted.🔽If one always meditates on that very nature of pleasure,

original: bde ba'i ngo bo de nyid dang // ldan zhing mchog dang zhi ba dang // bdag nyid rtag tu bsgom byas na //🔽'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med //
analyzed: bde ba'i ngo bo de nyid dang // ldan zhing mchog dang zhi ba dang // bdag nyid rtag tu bsgom byas na // 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tshom med //
translated: endowed with the supreme and the peaceful,

original: dngos grub @86a * //
analyzed: dngos grub @86a * //
translated: there is no doubt that one will be successful in this life.

original: thams cad ster ba'o //
analyzed: thams cad ster ba'o //
translated: It bestows all powers.

original: byang chub kyi sems lhung 'gyur na //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems lhung 'gyur na //
translated: If the bodhicitta falls,

original: rnam shes phung po brgyal gyur pas //
analyzed: rnam shes phung po brgyal gyur pas //
translated: the aggregate of consciousness will faint,

original: bla med dngos grub ga la yod //
analyzed: bla med dngos grub ga la yod //
translated: so how can there be the highest power?

original: ces 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ces 'byung ngo //
translated: Thus it is stated.

original: de ni las so //
analyzed: de ni las so //
translated: That is the rite.

original: yang na sangs rgyas ni dbang po dang yul bcu ste /
analyzed: yang na sangs rgyas ni dbang po dang yul bcu ste /
translated: Or, the Buddha is the ten faculties and objects,

original: de rnams kyi yum ni de dag gi rnam par shes pa rnams so //
analyzed: de rnams kyi yum ni de dag gi rnam par shes pa rnams so //
translated: and their mother is the consciousnesses of those.

original: de rnams gsum yang dag par sbyor ba'i reg pas mnyes par byas shing /
analyzed: de rnams gsum yang dag par sbyor ba'i reg pas mnyes par byas shing /
translated: Those three are pleased by the contact of their union,

original: mi gos pa ni rnal 'byor pa de phyugs bzhin du bcing bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: mi gos pa ni rnal 'byor pa de phyugs bzhin du bcing bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: and the yogi is not stained, not bound like an animal.

original: phul du byung ba'i thabs dang ldan pa'i phyir te so sor sdud pa'o //
analyzed: phul du byung ba'i thabs dang ldan pa'i phyir te so sor sdud pa'o //
translated: Because it is endowed with the most excellent method, it is the “withdrawal” [stage].

original: sangs rgyas ni dbang po dang yul rnams so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni dbang po dang yul rnams so //
translated: The “Buddha” is the sense faculties and their objects.

original: yum ni de rnams gcig tu byas nas /
analyzed: yum ni de rnams gcig tu byas nas /
translated: The “mother” is the unification of those.

original: sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin du mnyes par bya ba ni bsgoms shing mi gos pa ni rigs mi mthun pa'i yid la byed pa gzung bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin du mnyes par bya ba ni bsgoms shing mi gos pa ni rigs mi mthun pa'i yid la byed pa gzung bar mi bya'o //
translated: The “pleasing” is the meditation on the nature of the five buddhas, which is not sullied by the mental engagements of the different classes.

original: gzhan ni snga ma bzhin te bsam gtan no //
analyzed: gzhan ni snga ma bzhin te bsam gtan no //
translated: The other [points] are the same as before, and this is the “concentration” [stage].

original: sangs rgyas ni byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: The “Buddha” is the enlightenment spirit.

original: yum ni de nyid kyi thig le'o //
analyzed: yum ni de nyid kyi thig le'o //
translated: The “mother” is the drop of that.

original: gtso bo ni sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: gtso bo ni sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: The “chief” is the nature of diversity.

original: mnyes par bya ba ni de nyid spro ba'i rim pas 'gro ba dang 'ong bar byas shing rigs mi mthun pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams mi gos so //
analyzed: mnyes par bya ba ni de nyid spro ba'i rim pas 'gro ba dang 'ong bar byas shing rigs mi mthun pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams mi gos so //
translated: The “pleasing” is the process of emanating and gathering that, which is not sullied by the mental engagements of the different classes.

original: gzhan ni snga ma bzhin te srog dang rtsol ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni snga ma bzhin te srog dang rtsol ba'o //
translated: The other [points] are the same as before, and this is the “life-force and exertion” [stage].

original: sangs rgyas kyi yum ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab bo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi yum ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab bo //
translated: The “mother of the Buddha” is nonconceptual wisdom.

original: mnyes par bya ba ni shes rab de nyid kyis rdo rje'i rtse mor byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le 'dzin te /
analyzed: mnyes par bya ba ni shes rab de nyid kyis rdo rje'i rtse mor byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le 'dzin te /
translated: The pleasing is the retention of the drop of the spirit of enlightenment at the tip of the vajra by means of that very wisdom.

original: mi gos pa ni g-yo bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi gos pa ni g-yo bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The unsoiled is the non-moving.

original: gzhan ni snga ma bzhin te 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni snga ma bzhin te 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The other is the retention as before.

original: sangs rgyas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
translated: The Buddhas are the Tathagatas.

original: yum ni rigs kyi lha mo spyan la sogs pa dang gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa dang khro bo rnams so //
analyzed: yum ni rigs kyi lha mo spyan la sogs pa dang gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa dang khro bo rnams so //
translated: The Mothers are the goddesses of the families, Locana, etc., and Rupavajrā, etc., and the wrathful ones.

original: mnyes par bya ba ni de rnams thig le las 'gro ba'i don du spros te /
analyzed: mnyes par bya ba ni de rnams thig le las 'gro ba'i don du spros te /
translated: The pleasing is the emission of those from the drop for the sake of going to the sentient beings.

original: de'i tshe mi gos pa ni 'ba' zhig pa'i stong pa nyid tsam gyi rnam par rtog pas gzung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe mi gos pa ni 'ba' zhig pa'i stong pa nyid tsam gyi rnam par rtog pas gzung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: At that time, the unsoiled is the non-apprehension by the conception of mere emptiness alone.

original: gzhan ni snga ma bzhin te rjes su dran pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni snga ma bzhin te rjes su dran pa'o //
translated: The other is the recollection as before.

original: de bzhin sangs rgyas kyi yum ni /
analyzed: de bzhin sangs rgyas kyi yum ni /
translated: The Mothers of the Buddhas are the goddesses of the families, Locana, etc., and Rupavajrā, etc., and the wrathful ones.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nye bar bsdu bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyis byas la kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa'i rnam pa @86b gnyis su med pa srid pa dang zhi ba ro gcig pa'i ngo bo lha'i sku'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nye bar bsdu bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyis byas la kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa'i rnam pa @86b gnyis su med pa srid pa dang zhi ba ro gcig pa'i ngo bo lha'i sku'o //
translated: By the gathering of all the Tathagatas, the body of the deity is made of the atoms of all the Tathagatas, the essence of the nondual form of the two truths, the relative and the ultimate, the essence of the single taste of existence and peace.

original: de nyid 'gro ba'i don sna tshogs mdzad pa'i nus pas gtso bo de mnyes pa ni dmigs par byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas mi gos pa ste tha mal pa'i bag chags rnams kyis yang 'khrul bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid 'gro ba'i don sna tshogs mdzad pa'i nus pas gtso bo de mnyes pa ni dmigs par byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas mi gos pa ste tha mal pa'i bag chags rnams kyis yang 'khrul bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That very [deity] is the chief, the one who is pleased by the yogi who visualizes, the one who is not sullied, the one who does not again become deluded by the habitual tendencies of the ordinary.

original: de'i tshe sangs rgyas ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin gyi gnas 'grub par 'gyur ba ni mngon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe sangs rgyas ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin gyi gnas 'grub par 'gyur ba ni mngon du 'gyur ro //
translated: At that time, the Buddha, the nature of nonabiding nirvana, is accomplished, is realized.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pa dang / blo can ni shes rab chen po dang ldan pa ste ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pa dang / blo can ni shes rab chen po dang ldan pa ste ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: The nonconceptual one is endowed with great compassion, the wise one is endowed with great wisdom, this is samadhi.

original: de ni don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: de ni don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
translated: That is the yoga of Amoghasiddhi.

original: sangs rgyas ni rdzas lnga'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni rdzas lnga'o //
translated: The Buddha is the five substances.

original: de rnams kyi yum ni yi ge gsum mo //
analyzed: de rnams kyi yum ni yi ge gsum mo //
translated: Their mother is the three syllables.

original: de mnyes pa ni sbyong ba la sogs pa'i don du dgod pas tha ma la pa'i bag chags kyi rnam par rtog pa mi bya'o //
analyzed: de mnyes pa ni sbyong ba la sogs pa'i don du dgod pas tha ma la pa'i bag chags kyi rnam par rtog pa mi bya'o //
translated: Their satisfaction is the placement of the three syllables in the three places for the sake of purification, etc. One should not imagine that the final syllable is a residual impression.

original: bdud rtsi lnga spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa de nyid kyis sangs rgyas ni rdo rje 'chang nyid 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa de nyid kyis sangs rgyas ni rdo rje 'chang nyid 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: The yogin who practices the five nectars will attain the state of Buddhahood, that is, Vajradhara.

original: gang gi cho zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi cho zhe na /
translated: By what means?

original: gal te rtog pa ni gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba la sogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te rtog pa ni gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba la sogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If he does not conceptualize purity and impurity, etc.

original: blo can zhes pa ni blo ni ji bzhin byas pa'i bsgom pa ste /
analyzed: blo can zhes pa ni blo ni ji bzhin byas pa'i bsgom pa ste /
translated: The intelligent one, the one who has the mind, is the one who practices as it is.

original: de gang la yod pa de ni blo can te des so //
analyzed: de gang la yod pa de ni blo can te des so //
translated: The intelligent one is the one who has that.

original: yang na blo ni bskyed pa'i rim pa la sogs pa dran pa ste /
analyzed: yang na blo ni bskyed pa'i rim pa la sogs pa dran pa ste /
translated: Or else, the mind is the recollection of the creation stage, etc.

original: de gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin sgrub pa'o //
translated: The intelligent one is the one who has that.

original: 'dir ni las rtsod par byed de /
analyzed: 'dir ni las rtsod par byed de /
translated: Here, there is a dispute about the practice.

original: bshang gci zas su za ba ste //
analyzed: bshang gci zas su za ba ste //
translated: One should eat feces and urine as food.

original: zhes gang bshad pa de ni 'jig rten dang 'gal ba spyod pas khyi dang spyang ki la sogs pa bzhin du byis pa'i spyod par rnal 'byor ba thal bar mi 'gyur ram zhe na /
analyzed: zhes gang bshad pa de ni 'jig rten dang 'gal ba spyod pas khyi dang spyang ki la sogs pa bzhin du byis pa'i spyod par rnal 'byor ba thal bar mi 'gyur ram zhe na /
translated: But if one acts in a way that contradicts the world, then like dogs, wolves, and so on, one’s behavior will be childish.

original: smras pa / thal bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: smras pa / thal bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: Reply: That is not the case.

original: gang gi phyir rigs pas rtogs pa'i dngos po rnams gtsang ba la sogs pa mi dmigs te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rigs pas rtogs pa'i dngos po rnams gtsang ba la sogs pa mi dmigs te /
translated: Because things that are realized by reasoning are not perceived to be pure and so on.

original: de la re zhig phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams ni gtsang ba ma yin la /
analyzed: de la re zhig phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams ni gtsang ba ma yin la /
translated: First, external things are not pure.

original: mi gtsang ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: mi gtsang ba yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor are they impure.

original: gang gi phyir kho bo cag la tshad ma gnyis yod pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir kho bo cag la tshad ma gnyis yod pa ste /
translated: Because we have two valid cognitions.

original: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag go //
analyzed: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dag go //
translated: Direct perception and inference.

original: de la mngon sum du ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i rang bzhin rang gi mtshan nyid tsam 'dzin pas tshul 'di lta bu ma yin te /
analyzed: de la mngon sum du ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i rang bzhin rang gi mtshan nyid tsam 'dzin pas tshul 'di lta bu ma yin te /
translated: Direct perception is nonconceptual and apprehends only the mere intrinsic identity of things. It does not operate in this way.

original: 'di ni gtsang ba dang 'di ni mi gtsang ba zhes pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gtsang ba dang 'di ni mi gtsang ba zhes pa'o //
translated: It is not like, “This is pure” or “This is impure.”

original: de lta bu yin na mngon sum de ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas @87a * //
analyzed: de lta bu yin na mngon sum de ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas @87a * //
translated: If it were so, then that perception would be conceptual,

original: par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is a subsequent cognition that is preceded by a prior cognition.

original: de ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su 'brang ba tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su 'brang ba tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is merely the subsequent cognition that follows the occurrence and cessation of the particular characteristic.

original: nges pa'i shes pas rtogs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: nges pa'i shes pas rtogs par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is understood by a subsequent ascertaining consciousness,

original: de ni ma yin te nges pa'i shes pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid tsam nges par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te nges pa'i shes pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid tsam nges par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: that is not so, because an ascertaining consciousness ascertains the particular characteristic alone,

original: gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: not purity, impurity, and so on.

original: gang gi phyir rang gi mtshan nyid ni ngo bo gang gis mngon sum du snang ba ngo bo de nyid kyis nges pa'i shes pa ni rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyur rigs te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rang gi mtshan nyid ni ngo bo gang gis mngon sum du snang ba ngo bo de nyid kyis nges pa'i shes pa ni rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyur rigs te /
translated: It is reasonable that the cause for positing an ascertaining consciousness is the very nature by which the particular characteristic appears to it,

original: gzhan du na bum pa snang ba'i dus su snam bu nges par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na bum pa snang ba'i dus su snam bu nges par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: because otherwise it would follow, absurdly, that when a pot appears, a piece of cloth could be ascertained.

original: gzhan yang re zhig rnam par mi rtog pa ni tshad ma gtso bor rigs te /
analyzed: gzhan yang re zhig rnam par mi rtog pa ni tshad ma gtso bor rigs te /
translated: Moreover, it is reasonable that a nonconceptual consciousness is the principal valid cognition,🔽because it is the basis for the ascertainment of the object.

original: de ni de rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni de rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyu tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is merely the cause for positing it.

original: gang zhig 'di ni gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa de ni thog ma med pa'i bag chags kyis mnan pa'i rang dbang gi rnam par rtog par byas pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gang zhig 'di ni gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa de ni thog ma med pa'i bag chags kyis mnan pa'i rang dbang gi rnam par rtog par byas pa yin gyi /
translated: That conceptual thought which conceptualizes in terms of pure and impure, etc. is a conceptual thought that is autonomous, pressed down by beginningless latent potentialities.

original: dngos po las skyes pa'i shes pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po las skyes pa'i shes pas ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not produced from a thing.

original: gang gi phyir tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is neither different nor non-different.

original: de nyid rnam par gzhag pa yang rnam par rtog pa'i dbang gis de rnam par rtog pa de yang tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid rnam par gzhag pa yang rnam par rtog pa'i dbang gis de rnam par rtog pa de yang tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: And that positing is also by way of conceptual thought. And that conceptual thought is not a valid cognition.

original: bgres po rnams kyis gtan la bab pa'o //
analyzed: bgres po rnams kyis gtan la bab pa'o //
translated: This is the settled opinion of the elders.

original: de'i phyir mngon sum gyis ni gang gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba mi bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon sum gyis ni gang gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba mi bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should not make a distinction in terms of pure and impure, etc. by way of direct perception.

original: rjes su dpag pas kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas kyang ma yin te /
translated: Nor by way of inference.

original: de ni med par mi 'byung ba'i rtags mthong ba'i stobs kyis bskyed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni med par mi 'byung ba'i rtags mthong ba'i stobs kyis bskyed pa'i phyir te /
translated: because it is produced by the power of seeing the reason that is invariably concomitant with it,

original: du ba dang me bzhin du'o //
analyzed: du ba dang me bzhin du'o //
translated: like smoke with fire.

original: rdzas rnams kyang gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba la sogs pa rjes su dpag na med par mi 'byung ba'i rtags ni gang mi mthong ba ste /
analyzed: rdzas rnams kyang gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba la sogs pa rjes su dpag na med par mi 'byung ba'i rtags ni gang mi mthong ba ste /
translated: When inferring purity and impurity of substances, etc., the reason that is invariably concomitant with it is not seen.

original: gang gis 'di ltar rnam par gzhag par bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang gis 'di ltar rnam par gzhag par bya ba ste /
translated: By what is this established?

original: 'di ni gtsang ba nyid dang 'di ni mi gtsang ba zhes so //
analyzed: 'di ni gtsang ba nyid dang 'di ni mi gtsang ba zhes so //
translated: This is pure, that is impure.

original: 'on gang zhig 'di dri ngan pa dang mdog ser po la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'on gang zhig 'di dri ngan pa dang mdog ser po la sogs pa ste /
translated: But isn’t there a reason for that, namely, bad smell, yellow color, etc.?

original: rtags yod pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: rtags yod pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: Isn’t that a reason?

original: dri ngan pa ni gzhan rnams sgog pa la sogs pa yod pa ste /
analyzed: dri ngan pa ni gzhan rnams sgog pa la sogs pa yod pa ste /
translated: A bad smell is found in other things, such as garlic,

original: 'khrul pa can gyi rtags yin no //
analyzed: 'khrul pa can gyi rtags yin no //
translated: and that is a deceptive reason.

original: sgog pa la sogs pa ni thams cad kyis bza' bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: sgog pa la sogs pa ni thams cad kyis bza' bar bya ba yin no //
translated: Garlic, etc., is not to be eaten by everyone.

original: 'o na der yang 'di @87b nyid rtsod par bya ba ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na der yang 'di @87b nyid rtsod par bya ba ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But isn’t that also a matter of dispute?

original: de skad ma zer cig / bcud len bsgrub pa'i dus su sna tshogs pa'i rdzas kyi tshogs bskol na dri ngan pa dang bzang ba dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: de skad ma zer cig / bcud len bsgrub pa'i dus su sna tshogs pa'i rdzas kyi tshogs bskol na dri ngan pa dang bzang ba dmigs pa ste /
translated: When a variety of substances are boiled in the preparation of a medicinal elixir, the smell is sometimes bad and sometimes good.

original: de nyid kyang mi bza' bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyang mi bza' bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: But it follows that it should not be eaten.

original: gzhan yang dri ngan pa ni mi gtsang ba'i rtags yin pa dang / dri bzang ba ni gtsang ba'i rtags yin na /
analyzed: gzhan yang dri ngan pa ni mi gtsang ba'i rtags yin pa dang / dri bzang ba ni gtsang ba'i rtags yin na /
translated: Moreover, if a bad smell is a sign of impurity and a good smell is a sign of purity,

original: dgun chang la ni dri bzang ba yod pa ste bram ze rnams ci'i phyir mi 'thung ste /
analyzed: dgun chang la ni dri bzang ba yod pa ste bram ze rnams ci'i phyir mi 'thung ste /
translated: then why do the Brahmins not drink the winter beer that has a good smell?

original: 'on kyang btung ba nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang btung ba nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: But it follows that it should be drunk.

original: mdog ser po la sogs pa mi gtsang ba la sogs pa'i rtags ma yin te /
analyzed: mdog ser po la sogs pa mi gtsang ba la sogs pa'i rtags ma yin te /
translated: A yellow color and so on is not a sign of impurity and so on.

original: gser la sogs pa ser po yin pas reg par bya ba'i phyir gser de rnams ni bram zes ci'i phyir blang /
analyzed: gser la sogs pa ser po yin pas reg par bya ba'i phyir gser de rnams ni bram zes ci'i phyir blang /
translated: Since gold and so on are yellow, the Brahmins should accept gold because it is suitable to be touched.

original: de'i phyir 'di ni thams cad 'khrul pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ni thams cad 'khrul pa yin no //
translated: Therefore this is all confusion.

original: khong pa'i me'i reg pas mi gtsang ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: khong pa'i me'i reg pas mi gtsang ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is impure because it is touched by the fire of the stomach,🔽then it follows that the stomach itself is impure.

original: de ltar yin na ba'i khong pa'i me'i reg pas 'o ma yang mi btung bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar yin na ba'i khong pa'i me'i reg pas 'o ma yang mi btung bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were so, it would follow that one should not drink milk because of the contact of the heat of the stomach.

original: dro ba'i reg pa dag ni khong pa'i me'i reg pa kho bo cag mi zer te /
analyzed: dro ba'i reg pa dag ni khong pa'i me'i reg pa kho bo cag mi zer te /
translated: We do not say that the contact of the heat of the stomach is the contact of heat.

original: 'on kyang skyes pa'i smin ma'i gnas su smin pas mi gtsang ba ni bshad ba la sogs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on kyang skyes pa'i smin ma'i gnas su smin pas mi gtsang ba ni bshad ba la sogs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But the impurities of the place of the eyebrows are feces and so on.

original: de ltar yin na khrag dang shu kra dag smin ma'i gnas su mi smin pas yas cag gis btung bar thal par 'gyur te ha cang thal bar 'gyur bas chog go //
analyzed: de ltar yin na khrag dang shu kra dag smin ma'i gnas su mi smin pas yas cag gis btung bar thal par 'gyur te ha cang thal bar 'gyur bas chog go //
translated: If that were so, it would follow that one could drink blood and semen because they do not ripen in the place of the eyebrows. But enough of this digression.

original: de bas na 'khrul pa'i rtags mthong bas dngos po ni gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba la sogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na 'khrul pa'i rtags mthong bas dngos po ni gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba la sogs pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, since one sees the signs of error, things are not pure or impure and so on.

original: gzhan yang yas cag gis ni gtsang ba nyid du rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang yas cag gis ni gtsang ba nyid du rtogs pa ste /
translated: Moreover, one understands that the stomach is pure.

original: de la ni tshang ma gang yang mi dmigs te /
analyzed: de la ni tshang ma gang yang mi dmigs te /
translated: But nothing impure is observed there.

original: de rnams phyugs yin pas bshad pa la sogs pa za ba ste /
analyzed: de rnams phyugs yin pas bshad pa la sogs pa za ba ste /
translated: Since they are cattle, they eat feces and so on.

original: de las byung ba'i 'o ma ni btung bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de las byung ba'i 'o ma ni btung bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: The milk that comes from that is not to be drunk.

original: yas cag rnams kyis 'di ltar smra ba'i tshig ni 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: yas cag rnams kyis 'di ltar smra ba'i tshig ni 'gal ba yin te /
translated: All of you who say this are contradicting yourselves.

original: ba'i pags pa la zla ba btung bar bya ba ste ro ni mi reg pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ba'i pags pa la zla ba btung bar bya ba ste ro ni mi reg pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The moon does not touch the skin of the cow, because it has no taste.

original: sngags kyis dag par byas pas skyon med do zhe na /
analyzed: sngags kyis dag par byas pas skyon med do zhe na /
translated: If you say that there is no fault because it is purified by mantra,

original: de ltar yin na sngags kyis dag par byas pa'i skyes pa'i pags pa la yang zla ba btung bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar yin na sngags kyis dag par byas pa'i skyes pa'i pags pa la yang zla ba btung bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then it follows that the moon is to be drunk from the skin of a man purified by mantra.

original: 'jig rten la ma grags pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'jig rten la ma grags pa yin zhe na /
translated: If you say that this is not known in the world,

original: de ltar yin na 'jig rten la grags pa tshad ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de ltar yin na 'jig rten la grags pa tshad ma yin gyi /
translated: then what is known in the world is valid cognition.

original: rig byed kyi ngag ni tshad ma gang yang ma @88a * //
analyzed: rig byed kyi ngag ni tshad ma gang yang ma @88a * //
translated: The words of the Vedas are not valid cognition at all.

original: yin pas de'i tshe 'jig rten pas ni btsong bza' bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: yin pas de'i tshe 'jig rten pas ni btsong bza' bar byed pa ste /
translated: Therefore, when it is known in the world that one should eat beef,

original: de yang khyed cag rnams la tshad mar thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de yang khyed cag rnams la tshad mar thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: it follows that for you it is valid cognition.

original: 'jig rten la grags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten la grags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is known in the world.

original: 'jig rten la grags pa dang ldan pa'i rig byed kyi ngag tshad ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'jig rten la grags pa dang ldan pa'i rig byed kyi ngag tshad ma yin no zhe na /
translated: The Vedic statements are valid because they are accepted in the world.

original: de la gal te rig byed kyi ngag tshad ma yin na /
analyzed: de la gal te rig byed kyi ngag tshad ma yin na /
translated: If the Vedic statements are valid,

original: 'jig rten la grags pas ci bgyi ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten la grags pas ci bgyi ba'o //
translated: what use is the world’s acceptance?

original: gal te tshad ma ma yin na de'i tshe yang 'jig rten la grags pas ci bgyi ba'o //
analyzed: gal te tshad ma ma yin na de'i tshe yang 'jig rten la grags pas ci bgyi ba'o //
translated: If they are not valid, then what use is the world’s acceptance?

original: lhan cig byed pa tsam yin no zhe na /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa tsam yin no zhe na /
translated: They are merely co-operative conditions.

original: lhan cig byed pa ni phan par byed pa yin nam phan par byed pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa ni phan par byed pa yin nam phan par byed pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: Are the co-operative conditions helpful or not helpful?

original: phan par byed pa yin na sngar bstan pa'i skyon 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phan par byed pa yin na sngar bstan pa'i skyon 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If they are helpful, the previously stated error arises.

original: phan par byed pa ma yin na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phan par byed pa ma yin na ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If they are not helpful, there is an absurd consequence.

original: de bas na rtags med do //
analyzed: de bas na rtags med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no reason.

original: de bzhin du bram ze la sogs pa'i rigs rnams kyang bstan to //
analyzed: de bzhin du bram ze la sogs pa'i rigs rnams kyang bstan to //
translated: In the same way, the castes of Brahmins, etc. are taught.

original: de la srog dang / rigs dang / lus dang / shes pa dang / spyod pa dang / 'dus byas pa ni bram ze ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de la srog dang / rigs dang / lus dang / shes pa dang / spyod pa dang / 'dus byas pa ni bram ze ni ma yin te /
translated: In this regard, life, caste, body, knowledge, conduct, and composition are not Brahmins.

original: srog ni bram zer mi rigs te /🔽de ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi bdag nyid kyi dbus nas brtsams te /
analyzed: srog ni bram zer mi rigs te / de ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi bdag nyid kyi dbus nas brtsams te /
translated: It is not logical that life force is a Brahmin,🔽because it is undifferentiated, beginning from the middle of the body, which is the nature of pleasure and pain,

original: srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir khyad par med do //
analyzed: srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir khyad par med do //
translated: up to the peak of existence.

original: srog bram ze yin na bram ze'i lus gsod pas bram ze gsod pa nyid du thal bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: srog bram ze yin na bram ze'i lus gsod pas bram ze gsod pa nyid du thal bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If life force were a Brahmin, then killing a Brahmin would not follow from killing the body of a Brahmin.

original: rigs ni bram ze ma yin te /
analyzed: rigs ni bram ze ma yin te /
translated: Caste is not a Brahmin,

original: rigs ni gsal ba la gnas sam mi gnas /
analyzed: rigs ni gsal ba la gnas sam mi gnas /
translated: because caste is either based on the manifest or not based on the manifest.

original: gsal ba la gnas pa yin na gsal ba bzhin du mi rtag pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gsal ba la gnas pa yin na gsal ba bzhin du mi rtag pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: If it is based on the manifest, then it follows that it is impermanent, like the manifest.

original: rigs de yang khyed rnams ni rtag par 'dod do //
analyzed: rigs de yang khyed rnams ni rtag par 'dod do //
translated: And you assert that caste is permanent.

original: gsal ba mi gnas na gzhan du mi dmigs te /
analyzed: gsal ba mi gnas na gzhan du mi dmigs te /
translated: If it is not based on the manifest, then it is not observed elsewhere,

original: ri bong gi rva bzhin no //
analyzed: ri bong gi rva bzhin no //
translated: like the horn of a donkey.

original: lus kyang bram ze ma yin te /
analyzed: lus kyang bram ze ma yin te /
translated: The body is not a Brahmin,

original: rkang pa dang lag pa la sogs pa dang / shu kra dang khrag la sogs pa ni sme sha can dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rkang pa dang lag pa la sogs pa dang / shu kra dang khrag la sogs pa ni sme sha can dang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the feet, hands, and so on, and semen, blood, and so on, are similar to outcasts.

original: skra ser po la sogs pa nyid ni bram ze'i lus la 'khrul pa can yin te /
analyzed: skra ser po la sogs pa nyid ni bram ze'i lus la 'khrul pa can yin te /
translated: The color of the body, such as yellow hair, is not the defining characteristic of a Brahmin,

original: spre'u la sogs pa de mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spre'u la sogs pa de mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is seen in monkeys and so on.

original: rig byed klog pa'i shes pa'i mtshan nyid can bram ze nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rig byed klog pa'i shes pa'i mtshan nyid can bram ze nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: Being a Brahmin is not defined by the knowledge of reading the Vedas,

original: dmangs rigs la sogs pa yang de shes pa rnams bram zer thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dmangs rigs la sogs pa yang de shes pa rnams bram zer thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: because it would follow, absurdly, that even the low castes and so on would be Brahmins if they knew that.

original: khrus dang sbyin sreg la sogs @88b pa'i spyod pa'i bram ze nyid du khas blangs nas /
analyzed: khrus dang sbyin sreg la sogs @88b pa'i spyod pa'i bram ze nyid du khas blangs nas /
