translated: If you accept that being a Brahmin is defined by the conduct of bathing, performing fire offerings and so on,

original: de ni de dang ldan pa'i dmangs rigs kyi skyes pa yang bram ze nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni de dang ldan pa'i dmangs rigs kyi skyes pa yang bram ze nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would follow, absurdly, that even a low-caste man who engages in such conduct would be a Brahmin.

original: dus byas pa ni sgra mtshams phye ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can bram ze yin na /
analyzed: dus byas pa ni sgra mtshams phye ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can bram ze yin na /
translated: If being a Brahmin is defined by the characteristics of opening the mouth, and so on, at the time of death,

original: rigs ngan mo rnams kyang de byed pas na bram ze nyid du ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs ngan mo rnams kyang de byed pas na bram ze nyid du ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: then it would not be so, because low-caste women also do that.

original: de bas na bram ze la sogs pa'i rigs 'di rnams ni rtog pas byas pa'i tha snyad tsam yin no //
analyzed: de bas na bram ze la sogs pa'i rigs 'di rnams ni rtog pas byas pa'i tha snyad tsam yin no //
translated: Therefore, these castes of Brahmins and so on are mere conceptual designations.

original: gzhan yang khyed rnams kyi grub mtha' 'di yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang khyed rnams kyi grub mtha' 'di yin te /
translated: Moreover, your doctrine is as follows:🔽Brahmins are born from the head of the lord of creatures, Brahmä,

original: skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa'i spyi bo las skyes pa bram ze rnams skyes pa dang / lag pa dag las rgyal rigs dang / brla las rje rigs dang / rkang pa dag las dmangs rigs so //
analyzed: skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa'i spyi bo las skyes pa bram ze rnams skyes pa dang / lag pa dag las rgyal rigs dang / brla las rje rigs dang / rkang pa dag las dmangs rigs so //
translated: kṣatriyas are born from his arms, vaiśyas are born from his thighs, and śūdras are born from his feet.

original: de ltar yin na bram ze mo gang las skyes /
analyzed: de ltar yin na bram ze mo gang las skyes /
translated: If that is so, from what are brahmin women born?

original: phyi rol pa la sogs pa las skyes na rigs gzhan du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyi rol pa la sogs pa las skyes na rigs gzhan du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If they are born from non-brahmins, it follows that they are of another caste.

original: spyi bo nas skyes pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: spyi bo nas skyes pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If they are born from the head,

original: de ltar na rigs gcig las skyes pa'i bram ze mo dag phan tshun ming po dang srid mo yin te /
analyzed: de ltar na rigs gcig las skyes pa'i bram ze mo dag phan tshun ming po dang srid mo yin te /
translated: then brahmin women born from the same caste are each other’s siblings.

original: gzhan yang bram ze'i chung ma ni bram ze mo yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang bram ze'i chung ma ni bram ze mo yin te /
translated: Moreover, the wife of a brahmin is a brahmin woman.

original: rang gi rus la 'gro bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi rus la 'gro bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It follows that she is of the same clan.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba'am /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba'am /
translated: Therefore the distinction between pure and impure,

original: rigs kyi dbye ba don dam pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rigs kyi dbye ba don dam pa ma yin no //
translated: or the distinction between castes, is not ultimate.

original: 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig pu bram ze kho na yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig pu bram ze kho na yin te /
translated: However, the Bhagavat, the one perfectly enlightened Buddha, is a Brahmin alone.

original: gang gi tshangs pa'i de kho na nyid ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid can mkhyen pa dang ston par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshangs pa'i de kho na nyid ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid can mkhyen pa dang ston par mdzad pa'o //
translated: His Brahman, i.e., the Absolute, has the characteristic of the inseparability of the conventional and the ultimate, and he knows it and teaches it.

original: de nyid kyi theg pa la zhugs pa'i dge slong rnams kyang bram ze yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi theg pa la zhugs pa'i dge slong rnams kyang bram ze yin te /
translated: The monks who have entered his vehicle are also Brahmins,

original: rtag tu dge ba'i las spyod pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rtag tu dge ba'i las spyod pa'i phyir te /
translated: because they always practice virtuous actions.

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur bas chog go //
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur bas chog go //
translated: Enough of this digression.

original: da ni rnal ma'i don dpyad par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni rnal ma'i don dpyad par bya ste /
translated: Now we will analyze the main point.

original: de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sgrib pa thams cad sel ba gtso bor gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sa bcu'i dbang phyug go //
analyzed: de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sgrib pa thams cad sel ba gtso bor gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sa bcu'i dbang phyug go //
translated: Then, the bodhisattvas who are foremost in removing all obscurations, etc. The bodhisattvas who are foremost in removing all obscurations are the lords of the ten stages.

original: ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni gdol pa la sogs pa rnams rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob pa dang / rmad du gyur pa ni srog gcod pa rnams byang chub thob par thos so //🔽nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa 'joms pas bcom @89a * //
analyzed: ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni gdol pa la sogs pa rnams rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob pa dang / rmad du gyur pa ni srog gcod pa rnams byang chub thob par thos so // nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa 'joms pas bcom @89a * //
translated: The amazing is that even outcastes and so on attain the state of Great Vajradhara, and the marvelous is that even those who take life attain enlightenment.

original: ldan 'das so //
analyzed: ldan 'das so //
translated: The Blessed One is so called because he has conquered the afflictions and subsidiary afflictions.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni nyan thos la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag po ni stong pa nyid du gyur pa yin na yang /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni nyan thos la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag po ni stong pa nyid du gyur pa yin na yang /
translated: Therefore, although all the Tathagatas are the lords of the five Tathagatas and emptiness,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa spong ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa spong ba ste /
translated: all the Tathagatas abandon the afflictive and cognitive obstructions.

original: de rnams kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du tshig ngan pa ni rigs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du tshig ngan pa ni rigs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: Within the assembly of their retinues, the words caste and so on are spoken.

original: de nyid gsung pa ni shin tu gsal bar ston par mdzad pa de ni ngo mtshar che ba yin no zhes gsol te de ni sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid gsung pa ni shin tu gsal bar ston par mdzad pa de ni ngo mtshar che ba yin no zhes gsol te de ni sgrub pa'o //
translated: That very one, who teaches this very clearly, is amazing. This is the accomplishment.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, etc.🔽🔽

original: byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gsan nas de rnams kyi the tshom sel bar mdzad pa'i phyir mi bskyod pa la sogs pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gsan nas de rnams kyi the tshom sel bar mdzad pa'i phyir mi bskyod pa la sogs pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: Then, having heard the words of the bodhisattvas, in order to clear up their doubts, Akshobhya and the others said this:

original: 'di mthong ba ni bkag pa la'o //
analyzed: 'di mthong ba ni bkag pa la'o //
translated: “Do not see this as a prohibition.

original: ma'i sgra ni yang dang yang du'o //
analyzed: ma'i sgra ni yang dang yang du'o //
translated: The word ‘mother’ is used again and again.

original: des na don 'di yin te /
analyzed: des na don 'di yin te /
translated: Therefore, this is the meaning:🔽‘Sons of good family’ means that you who have arisen from the Tathagata family should not say that.

original: rigs kyi bu rnams zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung ba'i khyed rnams de skad ma zer cig / mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi rigs las byung ba'i khyod cag gis kyang tshig gi don de lta bu mi shes
analyzed: rigs kyi bu rnams zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung ba'i khyed rnams de skad ma zer cig / mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi rigs las byung ba'i khyod cag gis kyang tshig gi don de lta bu mi shes
translated: You who have arisen from the family of the six Tathagatas, Akshobhya and so forth, do not understand the meaning of the words in that way,

original: na gzhan sus shes pa ste gtad pa'o //
analyzed: na gzhan sus shes pa ste gtad pa'o //
translated: so if others do not understand, it is entrusted to them.

original: tshig rnams kyi dgongs pa de nyid gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: tshig rnams kyi dgongs pa de nyid gsungs pa yin te /
translated: The intended meaning of the words is stated:

original: snying po ye shes can rnams kyi //
analyzed: snying po ye shes can rnams kyi //
translated: The essence of those who possess wisdom

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so forth.

original: sangs rgyas ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid 'di yin te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid 'di yin te /
translated: Buddha is the reality of the Tathagata, the nature of the purification of the afflictions such as desire.

original: gang zhig tshig rnams kyis brjod par bya ba thams cad stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: gang zhig tshig rnams kyis brjod par bya ba thams cad stong pa nyid do //
translated: It is emptiness, the object of all verbal expressions.

original: dag pa zhes pa ni thabs la mkhas pas kun du bzang po'o //
analyzed: dag pa zhes pa ni thabs la mkhas pas kun du bzang po'o //
translated: Pure means completely good, due to skill in means.

original: sangs rgyas ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is Buddha like?

original: snying po ni 'od gsal ba ste /
analyzed: snying po ni 'od gsal ba ste /
translated: The essence is clear light.

original: de shes pas na snying po ye shes can te de rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: de shes pas na snying po ye shes can te de rnams kyi'o //
translated: Those who know that are the essence-wisdom beings.

original: chos nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: chos nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is reality like?

original: snying po chos nyid ni 'od gsal ba ste /
analyzed: snying po chos nyid ni 'od gsal ba ste /
translated: The reality of the essence is clear light.

original: de'i mchog ni skyu ma lta bu'i sku ste de las 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: de'i mchog ni skyu ma lta bu'i sku ste de las 'byung ba'o //
translated: The supreme of that is the body like a reflection, which arises from that.

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la dmigs te /
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la dmigs te /
translated: It is the object of the illusion-like samadhi.

original: bstan pa 'di rdo rje sems dpas mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: bstan pa 'di rdo rje sems dpas mdzad pa'o //
translated: This teaching was composed by Vajrasattva.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bstan pa 'di ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bstan pa 'di ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: For that very reason, what is this teaching like?

original: byang chub spyod pa'i gnas 'di yin //
analyzed: byang chub spyod pa'i gnas 'di yin //
translated: This is the abode of the practice of enlightenment.

original: zhes pa la /
analyzed: zhes pa la /
translated: What is the meaning of this?

original: byang chub ni spros pa dang bcas @89b pa'i spyod pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub ni spros pa dang bcas @89b pa'i spyod pa'o //
translated: Enlightenment is the performance of the elaborate practice.

original: spyod pa ni spros pa med pa'i spyod pa'o //
analyzed: spyod pa ni spros pa med pa'i spyod pa'o //
translated: Practice is the performance of the unelaborate practice.

original: gnas ni shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa ste /
analyzed: gnas ni shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa ste /
translated: Place is the performance of the very unelaborate practice.

original: de rnams kyi rang bzhin yin pas mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa gsum ster bar byed pa'o zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rang bzhin yin pas mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa gsum ster bar byed pa'o zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: Since they are the nature of those, the three kinds of manifest enlightenment are bestowed.

original: de ni sems rnam par dag pa dang / bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa dang sgrub pa rnams so //
analyzed: de ni sems rnam par dag pa dang / bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa dang sgrub pa rnams so //
translated: This is the stage of mind-only, the stage of self-consecration, and the stage of practice.

original: yang na sangs rgyas ni yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i chos kyi gsung rab mkhyen pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos nyid ni rtogs par bya ba'i don bstan pa'o //
analyzed: yang na sangs rgyas ni yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i chos kyi gsung rab mkhyen pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos nyid ni rtogs par bya ba'i don bstan pa'o //
translated: Or else, the reality of the Tathagatas, who know the scriptures of the twelve branches of the Buddha's speech, is the teaching of the meaning to be realized.

original: dag pa ni gsal ba'o //
analyzed: dag pa ni gsal ba'o //
translated: Purity is clarity.

original: sangs rgyas ni ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is enlightenment?

original: snying po ni 'gro ba'i sems te /
analyzed: snying po ni 'gro ba'i sems te /
translated: The essence is the mind of beings.

original: de mkhyen pas na snying po ye shes can no //
analyzed: de mkhyen pas na snying po ye shes can no //
translated: Since he knows that, he is the knower of the essence.

original: chos nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: chos nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is reality?

original: snying po'i chos ni tshig ste de nyid kyi mchog ni brjod par bya ba'i don de las byung ba ni skyes pa ste /
analyzed: snying po'i chos ni tshig ste de nyid kyi mchog ni brjod par bya ba'i don de las byung ba ni skyes pa ste /
translated: The meaning of the words is as follows: The essence of the Dharma is the word. The supreme of those is the meaning of the expression that arises from it.

original: rtogs par bya ba'i don bstan pa ni byang chub spyod pa ni rnam pa gsum gyi spyod pas bsgom par byas na /
analyzed: rtogs par bya ba'i don bstan pa ni byang chub spyod pa ni rnam pa gsum gyi spyod pas bsgom par byas na /
translated: Having cultivated the conduct of enlightenment through the conduct of the three aspects,

original: gnas ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur ro zhes tshig gi don to //
analyzed: gnas ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur ro zhes tshig gi don to //
translated: the place is the attainment of the state of Great Vajradhara.

original: de ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: That is the completion stage.

original: 'dir ni sgra brjod pas bum pa la sogs pa bzhin du lto ba che ba'i rnam pa'i mtshan nyid can don rtogs par bya ba gang yin pa de ni rjod par byed pa'i brjod bya'i mtshan nyid can gyi don yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ni sgra brjod pas bum pa la sogs pa bzhin du lto ba che ba'i rnam pa'i mtshan nyid can don rtogs par bya ba gang yin pa de ni rjod par byed pa'i brjod bya'i mtshan nyid can gyi don yin no //
translated: Here, the meaning that is to be understood, which has the characteristic of the form of a great belly like a pot, and so on, expressed by the words, is the meaning that has the characteristic of the expressed object of expression.

original: brjod bya'i don shes nas de nyid kyi stobs kyis don gzhan rtogs par bya ba gang yin pa de ni rtogs par bya ba'i don yin te /
analyzed: brjod bya'i don shes nas de nyid kyi stobs kyis don gzhan rtogs par bya ba gang yin pa de ni rtogs par bya ba'i don yin te /
translated: Having understood the expressed meaning, the meaning that is to be understood is that which is to be understood through the power of that, which is another meaning.

original: dper na kye dge slong 'jigs pa med cing song shig / gtsang po'i ngos la gnas pa'i seng ges khyi de bsad do zhes tshig gi don dpyod na brjod bya'i don 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid can yin pa dang / rtogs par bya ba'i don dpyod na 'on kyang 'gro ba bkag pa rtogs par bya ba ni /
analyzed: dper na kye dge slong 'jigs pa med cing song shig / gtsang po'i ngos la gnas pa'i seng ges khyi de bsad do zhes tshig gi don dpyod na brjod bya'i don 'gro ba'i mtshan nyid can yin pa dang / rtogs par bya ba'i don dpyod na 'on kyang 'gro ba bkag pa rtogs par bya ba ni /
translated: If one analyzes the meaning of the words, the meaning to be expressed is that which has the characteristic of going, and if one analyzes the meaning to be understood, the meaning to be understood is the negation of going.

original: brjod bya dang rtogs par bya ba'i don dag tha dang pa'o //
analyzed: brjod bya dang rtogs par bya ba'i don dag tha dang pa'o //
translated: The meaning to be expressed and the meaning to be understood are different.

original: ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi don yang sgra rnams kyis yod pa ste /
analyzed: ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi don yang sgra rnams kyis yod pa ste /
translated: The meaning that has the characteristic of the opposite is also expressed by words.

original: dper na shing zhes bya ba brjad  na shing ma yin pa las ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi don rtogs pa de /
analyzed: dper na shing zhes bya ba brjad  na shing ma yin pa las ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi don rtogs pa de /
translated: For example, when the word “tree” is uttered, the meaning that has the characteristic of the opposite of non-tree is understood.

original: yi ge dbyangs dang sgra dag ni //
analyzed: yi ge dbyangs dang sgra dag ni //
translated: As it is said, “The letters, vowels, and sounds . . .” and so on.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This has been explained previously.

original: sgra la yang don du ma ston pa'i nus pa yang yod pa ste /🔽gang dang gang don @90a * //
analyzed: sgra la yang don du ma ston pa'i nus pa yang yod pa ste /🔽gang dang gang don @90a * //
translated: Also, words have the power to express many meanings.🔽For example, the word “go”

original: bstan par 'dod pa de dang de gsal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: bstan par 'dod pa de dang de gsal bar 'gyur te /
translated: That which is desired to be taught is clarified,

original: rma bya'i sgo nga'i khu ba bzhin dang rtsangs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rma bya'i sgo nga'i khu ba bzhin dang rtsangs pa bzhin no //
translated: like the juice of a peacock's egg, like a lizard.

original: dper na sgra gcig pu go zhes bya ba ni don bcu ston pa ste /
analyzed: dper na sgra gcig pu go zhes bya ba ni don bcu ston pa ste /
translated: For example, the single word go teaches ten meanings:

original: dag phyogs sa 'og rdo rje mda' //
analyzed: dag phyogs sa 'og rdo rje mda' //
translated: Go means purity, direction, earth, underworld, vajra,

original: phyugs mig mtho ris chu rnams te //🔽blo dang ldan pas don bcu la //
analyzed: phyugs mig mtho ris chu rnams te // blo dang ldan pas don bcu la //
translated: arrow, cattle, eye, heaven, and waters.🔽The wise one should express

original: go yi sgra ni nges par brjod //
analyzed: go yi sgra ni nges par brjod //
translated: the word go with ten meanings.

original: ces bya ba ni du ma bstan pa'i nus pa'i dpe yin no //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni du ma bstan pa'i nus pa'i dpe yin no //
translated: This is an example of the power of teaching many.

original: de bas na rtogs par bya ba ni don bstan pa gzung ba yin na /🔽kye byang chub sems dpa' rnams rdo rje 'chang chen po ni rim pa lnga la sogs pa'i don gtso bor gyur pa bstan pa ste /
analyzed: de bas na rtogs par bya ba ni don bstan pa gzung ba yin na / kye byang chub sems dpa' rnams rdo rje 'chang chen po ni rim pa lnga la sogs pa'i don gtso bor gyur pa bstan pa ste /
translated: Therefore, if what is to be understood is the teaching of the meaning,🔽Hey, bodhisattvas, do not understand that the meaning of the five stages and so on taught by Great Vajradhara is a contradictory meaning.

original: khyed rnams kyis 'gal ba'i don yin no zhes rtogs par ma byed cig / de ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: khyed rnams kyis 'gal ba'i don yin no zhes rtogs par ma byed cig / de ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: That is the completion stage.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la brjod kyis mi long ba la sogs pa ni sngar bshad zin to //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la brjod kyis mi long ba la sogs pa ni sngar bshad zin to //
translated: Then, etc. The inexpressible and so forth have been explained previously.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams par sel ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams par sel ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The Bodhisattvas are the Vidyādharas and so forth.

original: 'jigs pa ni spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa'i don thos nas cung zhig rnam par rtog pa zad pa'o //
analyzed: 'jigs pa ni spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa'i don thos nas cung zhig rnam par rtog pa zad pa'o //
translated: Fear is the exhaustion of a little discursive thought upon hearing the meaning of the conduct with elaboration.

original: skrag pa ni spros pa med pa'i spyod pa sgom pas sems rtse gcig par gyur pa'o //🔽rgyal bar gyur pa ni shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa sgom pas rnam par rtog pa ma lus pa med cing /
analyzed: skrag pa ni spros pa med pa'i spyod pa sgom pas sems rtse gcig par gyur pa'o // rgyal bar gyur pa ni shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa sgom pas rnam par rtog pa ma lus pa med cing /
translated: Dread is the one-pointedness of mind that comes from cultivating the conduct without elaboration.

original: 'od gsal ba tsam la gcig tu rtsol ba ri bo bzhin du mi g-yo ba rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: 'od gsal ba tsam la gcig tu rtsol ba ri bo bzhin du mi g-yo ba rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs par gyur pa ste /
translated: Victory is the entry into the vajra-like meditative stabilization, which is the non-existence of all discursive thought through cultivating the conduct without great elaboration, and the effort to be one-pointedly in just the clear light, immovable like a mountain.

original: mngon par byang chub pa dang zung 'jug gi rim pa dang sgrub pa rnams so //
analyzed: mngon par byang chub pa dang zung 'jug gi rim pa dang sgrub pa rnams so //
translated: [This is] the stage of manifest enlightenment, union, and practice.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das chen po'i bstan pa gsal bar byed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i rim pas 'od gsal ba la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gzigs te /
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das chen po'i bstan pa gsal bar byed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i rim pas 'od gsal ba la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gzigs te /
translated: Having seen the retinue of bodhisattvas who have entered luminosity through the stages of hearing, contemplating, and meditating on the words of the Tathāgata that illuminate the teaching of the Great Bhagavat,

original: rgyud kyi le'u gzhan bshad pa'i phyir nyan pa po med pas ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug bskul bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyud kyi le'u gzhan bshad pa'i phyir nyan pa po med pas ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug bskul bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to exhort the lord of the maṇḍala of the tathāgatas, since there are no listeners, in order to explain the other chapters of the tantra,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: then, etc. is stated.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyal bar gyur pa gzigs pa ni ting nge 'dzin la zhugs par gzigs te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyal bar gyur pa gzigs pa ni ting nge 'dzin la zhugs par gzigs te /
translated: The bodhisattvas who have attained victory are seen to have entered into samādhi.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po ni bcom ldan 'das @90b rdo rje 'chang chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po ni bcom ldan 'das @90b rdo rje 'chang chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: The lord of the body, speech, and mind of all tathāgatas, the Bhagavat Mahāvajradhara, said this to him:

original: slang bar gsol zhes pa ni dpal gsang ba 'dus pa ma rdzogs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa'i mthus 'od gsal ba la zhugs pa de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: slang bar gsol zhes pa ni dpal gsang ba 'dus pa ma rdzogs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa'i mthus 'od gsal ba la zhugs pa de ni mi rigs te /
translated: The request please raise them is that since the glorious Guhyasamaja is incomplete, the bodhisattvas entering into clear light by the power of the teaching of the Bhagavan is not reasonable.

original: sems can gyi don med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can gyi don med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not for the sake of sentient beings.

original: de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di rnams bslang bar gsol zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di rnams bslang bar gsol zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the request of the tathagatas is please raise them, that is, please raise the bodhisattvas from clear light.

original: gsol ba btab ma thag tu rdo rje 'chang chen pos nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ni 'od gsal ba ste /🔽de dang gnyis su med pa ni de nyid las /
analyzed: gsol ba btab ma thag tu rdo rje 'chang chen pos nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ni 'od gsal ba ste / de dang gnyis su med pa ni de nyid las /
translated: Immediately after the request, great vajra holder refers to clear light equal to space.

original: cig car du spro ba'i rdo rje ni sgyu ma lta bu'i sku ste /
analyzed: cig car du spro ba'i rdo rje ni sgyu ma lta bu'i sku ste /
translated: Nondual with that, the vajra of simultaneous emanation refers to the illusory body.

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la yod pa de ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa la zhugs so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la yod pa de ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa la zhugs so //
translated: The samadhi that has that is entered into the stage of self consecration.

original: de 'das ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i 'od ni /
analyzed: de 'das ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i 'od ni /
translated: Immediately after that, the light of the body of the Bhagavan refers to the light of the body of Vajradhara.

original: 'ja' tshon dang 'dra bas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la reg pa ste /
analyzed: 'ja' tshon dang 'dra bas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams la reg pa ste /
translated: Like a rainbow, they touch those Bodhisattvas.

original: snying gar zhugs shing 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te sgyu ma lta bu'i sku 'dzin par gyur to //
analyzed: snying gar zhugs shing 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te sgyu ma lta bu'i sku 'dzin par gyur to //
translated: Having entered into the heart, they arise from the clear light samadhi and assume the illusion-like body.

original: rang rang gi stan ni padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i gdan la 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i phyir rgyud lhag ma mnyam du gnas par gyur pa de bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: rang rang gi stan ni padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i gdan la 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i phyir rgyud lhag ma mnyam du gnas par gyur pa de bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: Their own seats are the seats of the lotus, moon disc, etc. They remain in the remaining tantras in order to benefit migrating beings. That is the stage of self-consecration.

original: yang rang rang gi stan ni sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis te de la sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yang rang rang gi stan ni sgyu ma'i dpe bcu gnyis te de la sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir /
translated: Again, their own seats are the twelve examples of illusion. In order to benefit sentient beings,

original: gnas par gyur te don de nyid do //
analyzed: gnas par gyur te don de nyid do //
translated: they remain in order to benefit sentient beings. That is the meaning.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la spyod pa'i don gtan la dbab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la spyod pa'i don gtan la dbab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa ste /
translated: Then, etc. The Tathagatas and Bodhisattvas who have ascertained the meaning of the practice praise the Bhagavat.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pas so //🔽rmad du gyur pa ni spros pa med pa'i spyod pas so //
analyzed: ngo mtshar du gyur pa ni spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pas so // rmad du gyur pa ni spros pa med pa'i spyod pas so //
translated: The “amazement” is by the elaborate conduct.🔽The “wonder” is by the unelaborate conduct.

original: dgyes par khyab par gyur pa ni shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pas so //
analyzed: dgyes par khyab par gyur pa ni shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pas so //
translated: The “joy” is by the very unelaborate conduct.

original: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo rdo rje'i 'chang chen po la chos kyi dbyings ni bstod pa'i tshig mdzad pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi ngo bo rdo rje'i 'chang chen po la chos kyi dbyings ni bstod pa'i tshig mdzad pa ste /
translated: The praise is composed by the great vajra holder of the nature of all phenomena.

original: sgrub pa'o // ae ma'i chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: sgrub pa'o // ae ma'i chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The accomplishment is stated in the line beginning with “e ma ho” and so forth.

original: ae ma'o chos zhes pa ni spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa'o //
analyzed: ae ma'o chos zhes pa ni spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa'o //
translated: “E ma ho” is the elaborate conduct.

original: chos kyi sgra gnyis pas spros pa med pa'i spyod pa'o //🔽chos dang @91a * //
analyzed: chos kyi sgra gnyis pas spros pa med pa'i spyod pa'o // chos dang @91a * //
translated: The second “dharma” is the unelaborate conduct.

original: don ni spros pa gnyis las 'byung bas na /
analyzed: don ni spros pa gnyis las 'byung bas na /
translated: The “dharma” and “meaning” are the two elaborations.

original: chos ston pa las 'byung ba ni shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa'o //
analyzed: chos ston pa las 'byung ba ni shin tu spros pa med pa'i spyod pa'o //
translated: The “arising” from the dharma teaching is the very unelaborate conduct.

original: rgyu bstan nas 'bras bu bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: rgyu bstan nas 'bras bu bstan par bya ste /
translated: Having taught the cause, the result is taught.

original: chos don dag pa ni chos 'byung gi mngon par byang chub pa'o //
analyzed: chos don dag pa ni chos 'byung gi mngon par byang chub pa'o //
translated: The “purification of the dharma and meaning” is the manifest enlightenment of the source of phenomena.

original: bdag med pa ni chos dbyings mngon par byang chub pa'o //
analyzed: bdag med pa ni chos dbyings mngon par byang chub pa'o //
translated: The non-self is the clearlight transparency of the Reality realm.

original: rdo rje rgyal po ni bla na med pa'i mngon par byang chub pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la bstan pa gang yin pa de bas na khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud ces bya ste sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rgyal po ni bla na med pa'i mngon par byang chub pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la bstan pa gang yin pa de bas na khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud ces bya ste sgrub pa'o //
translated: The Vajra King is the unexcelled clearlight transparency, which the Lord has revealed to us.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni yi ge gsum mo //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni yi ge gsum mo //
translated: Body, Speech, and Mind are the three syllables.

original: de las 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim pa dang / dkyil 'khor spro ba'i rim pas 'byung ba ni 'od gsal ba gang yin pa de'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de las 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim pa dang / dkyil 'khor spro ba'i rim pas 'byung ba ni 'od gsal ba gang yin pa de'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The arising of the process of entry, etc. , and the process of the emanation of the mandala is the clearlight transparency, which is their nature.

original: nam mkha' ni rnam par shes pa gsum dang rang bzhin rnams te /
analyzed: nam mkha' ni rnam par shes pa gsum dang rang bzhin rnams te /
translated: Space is the three consciousnesses and the natures.

original: don dam par thog ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don dam par thog ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In the ultimate sense, they are primordially unborn.

original: de rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ni snang ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis nye bar bsdus pa de'i gnas ni thams cad stong pa ste de'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ni snang ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis nye bar bsdus pa de'i gnas ni thams cad stong pa ste de'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Their sameness is the clearlight transparency, which is their nature.

original: de'i rang bzhin du rnam par mi rtog pa ni 'od gsal ba las langs te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin du rnam par mi rtog pa ni 'od gsal ba las langs te /
translated: The nature of that is non-conceptuality, arising from clear light.

original: sha la sogs pa'i rnam pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sku la gnas pa'o //🔽snang ba med pa zhes bya ba la snang ba ni mtshan mo dang nyin mo dang mtshams kyi bdag nyid 'dod chags la sogs pa gsum ste /
analyzed: sha la sogs pa'i rnam pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sku la gnas pa'o // snang ba med pa zhes bya ba la snang ba ni mtshan mo dang nyin mo dang mtshams kyi bdag nyid 'dod chags la sogs pa gsum ste /
translated: It is the state of the gnosis body, devoid of flesh and so forth.

original: de med pa ni man ngag bzhi pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de med pa ni man ngag bzhi pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The non-appearance is the nature of the fourth instruction.

original: yang na snang ba ni ril por 'dzin pa dang rjes su 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dag gis rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes thob pa'o //🔽de dag gi rdo rje'i sku ni /
analyzed: yang na snang ba ni ril por 'dzin pa dang rjes su 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dag gis rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes thob pa'o // de dag gi rdo rje'i sku ni /
translated: Or, appearance is the attainment of non-conceptual gnosis by means of the samādhis characterized by the apprehending of the whole and the subsequent engagement.

original: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo zung du 'jug pa'i bdag nyid kyi sku la gnas pa khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud ces pa ni dad pa phul du byung bas ni tshig gnyis so //
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngo bo zung du 'jug pa'i bdag nyid kyi sku la gnas pa khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud ces pa ni dad pa phul du byung bas ni tshig gnyis so //
translated: The vajra body is the state of the body of the nature of union, the essence of non-abiding nirvāṇa, by means of the vajra-like samādhi. The two lines I bow to you are the offering of faith.

original: de ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang sems rnam par dag pa dang ; bdag byin gyis brlab pa dang / mngon par byang chub pa dang / zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa rnams so //
analyzed: de ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa dang sems rnam par dag pa dang ; bdag byin gyis brlab pa dang / mngon par byang chub pa dang / zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa rnams so //
translated: That is the stage of the vajra repetition, the purification of the mind, the self consecration, the manifest enlightenment, and the union.

original: thugs ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi bsgom pas chos thams cad mi snang bar byed pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: thugs ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi bsgom pas chos thams cad mi snang bar byed pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The mind is the Tathagata, because of the meditation on emptiness, the nature of making all things invisible.

original: gtso bo ni de la sa bon bkod pas mchog @91b go ;🔽/ dus gsum gyi dam tshig dang ye shes dang ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: gtso bo ni de la sa bon bkod pas mchog @91b go ; / dus gsum gyi dam tshig dang ye shes dang ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' ste /
translated: The chief one is the seed syllable, because of the placement of the seed syllable.

original: de rnams kyi lam ni gzugs sgrub pa dang / ye shes 'khor lo la zhugs pa la sogs pa ste 'jug par byed pas na dus gsum dag gi lam 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi lam ni gzugs sgrub pa dang / ye shes 'khor lo la zhugs pa la sogs pa ste 'jug par byed pas na dus gsum dag gi lam 'jug pa'o //
translated: The pledge, intuition, and concentration beings of the three times are the path of those, because they cause the entry into the creation of the form, the entry into the intuition wheel, and so on.

original: de nas khams ni spyan la sogs pa dang / gyur pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang / chen po ni gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa dang / nam mkha' ni byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo rnams 'jug pa snga ma dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de nas khams ni spyan la sogs pa dang / gyur pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang / chen po ni gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa dang / nam mkha' ni byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo rnams 'jug pa snga ma dang sbyar ro //
translated: Then, the elements are Locanā, etc., the transformations are the Tathāgatas, the great elements are Rūpavajrā, etc., the space is the Bodhisattvas, and the wrathful ones are the same as above.

original: de bzhin du nam mkha'i lam ni nam mkha' bzhin mi dmigs pas bstod pa dang mchod pa dang bdud rtsi myong bas de rnams kyi lam gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du nam mkha'i lam ni nam mkha' bzhin mi dmigs pas bstod pa dang mchod pa dang bdud rtsi myong bas de rnams kyi lam gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Likewise, the path of space is so called because it is the path on which they exist, since it is praised, worshipped, and tasted as nectar, being non-apprehensible like space.

original: de 'dra ba'i rang bzhin khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod ces bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du tshig gnyis so //
analyzed: de 'dra ba'i rang bzhin khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod ces bya ba ni snga ma bzhin du tshig gnyis so //
translated: The two words “I praise and worship you, whose nature is such” are as before.

original: dang por sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog dang las kyi rgyal ba mchog rnams so //
analyzed: dang por sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog dang las kyi rgyal ba mchog rnams so //
translated: First, there are the yoga, the supreme victors of the mandala, and the supreme victors of action.

original: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin la bstod pa ni nam mkha' ni me long lta bu'i ye shes las sku drang ba byung ba ni skye ba gang la yod pa de ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin la bstod pa ni nam mkha' ni me long lta bu'i ye shes las sku drang ba byung ba ni skye ba gang la yod pa de ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: The praise of the nature of the five Tathagatas is as follows: Space is the mirror-like pristine awareness, and the body that arises from it is Vairochana, who is the one in whom that occurs.

original: nam mkha' ni so sor rtog pa ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' ni so sor rtog pa ste /
translated: Space is the discerning pristine awareness,

original: de'i lam 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o//
analyzed: de'i lam 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o//
translated: and the one who enters the path of that is Amitabha.

original: nam mkha' ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te /
analyzed: nam mkha' ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te /
translated: Space is the pristine awareness of the ultimate dimension of phenomena,

original: de'i rang bzhin thugs la yod pa de ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin thugs la yod pa de ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: and the one in whom that is present in the mind is Akshobhya.

original: chos mnyam par byed pas na chos ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
analyzed: chos mnyam par byed pas na chos ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te /
translated: Dharma is the pristine awareness of the sameness of phenomena, because it equalizes phenomena.

original: de'i chos ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //🔽bya ba nan tan sgrub pa'i ye shes kyis bstan pa dang / smin pa dang grol ba'i mtshan nyid spyod pa ste /
analyzed: de'i chos ni rin chen 'byung ldan no // bya ba nan tan sgrub pa'i ye shes kyis bstan pa dang / smin pa dang grol ba'i mtshan nyid spyod pa ste /
translated: That dharma is Ratnasambhava.

original: de la gnas pa bzhugs pa gang yin pa de ni don yod grub pa ste /
analyzed: de la gnas pa bzhugs pa gang yin pa de ni don yod grub pa ste /
translated: The one who abides in the conduct characterized by the ripening of beings and the liberation of beings through the pristine awareness of the accomplishment of activities is Amoghasiddhi.

original: de ltar gyur pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni bstod pa ste bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni bstod pa ste bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: Thus, Homage to you! is the praise, which is the creation stage.

original: sngags pa'i sgo nas spyod pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: sngags pa'i sgo nas spyod pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: The conduct by way of mantra is threefold:

original: de nyid kyi mchog ni byang chub dam pa'i 'bras bu le'u gang la gsungs pa de skad ces bya ste sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi mchog ni byang chub dam pa'i 'bras bu le'u gang la gsungs pa de skad ces bya ste sgrub pa'o //
translated: The chapter in which the supreme of those, the fruit of excellent enlightenment, is taught is called The Chapter on the Supreme Fruit. It is the accomplishment.

original: rgyud 'grel las le'u lnga pa'i tshig gi don bcu drug gi bshad pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud 'grel las le'u lnga pa'i tshig gi don bcu drug gi bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the commentary on the sixteenth chapter of the tantra, called The Chapter on the Supreme Fruit.

original: le'u lnga pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i grangs ni sum brgya drug cu'o /🔽// / sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa sngon du 'gro ba'i @92a * //
analyzed: le'u lnga pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i grangs ni sum brgya drug cu'o / // / sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa sngon du 'gro ba'i @92a * //
translated: The number of verses in the fifth chapter is three hundred and sixty.

original: spyod pa'o zhes bya bas sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: spyod pa'o zhes bya bas sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i don du'o //
translated: The conduct preceded by the consecration of body, speech, and mind means for the sake of the consecration of body, speech, and mind.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas le'u drug pa bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas le'u drug pa bstan par bya ste /
translated: Now, in order to explain the sixth chapter, it is said, Then, and so on.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi mthus bag chags rnams kyis mi 'khrugs pas na mi bskyod pa ste de nyid thugs rdo rje'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi mthus bag chags rnams kyis mi 'khrugs pas na mi bskyod pa ste de nyid thugs rdo rje'o //
translated: It is Akṣobhya because it is not disturbed by the instincts through the power of the wisdom of the ultimate realm.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin gyi gsang ba ni yi ge gsum mo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin gyi gsang ba ni yi ge gsum mo //
translated: The secret of the nature of the body, speech, and mind of all tathāgatas is the three syllables.

original: de'i dam tshig rdo rje ni gtso bor gyur pa yi ge h'um ngo //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig rdo rje ni gtso bor gyur pa yi ge h'um ngo //
translated: The commitment-vajra is the syllable hūṃ, which is the principal one.

original: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
analyzed: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
translated: He entered into the meditative absorption called “that”

original: byin gyis brlabs pa ni thugs mi bskyod pa nyid du byed par nus pa'o //
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs pa ni thugs mi bskyod pa nyid du byed par nus pa'o //
translated: and blessed it, which means that he empowered it to be the mind of Akṣobhya.

original: sngags ni gsang ba dag gam /
analyzed: sngags ni gsang ba dag gam /
translated: The mantra is the secret,

original: yid skyob pa'i chos gsungs te /
analyzed: yid skyob pa'i chos gsungs te /
translated: or the Dharma that protects the mind.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: It is the stage of generation.

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsitta badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsitta badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba la /
translated: Om sarva tathāgata citta vajra svabhāva ātmako ’ham

original: aom ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: aom ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so //
translated: Om is the wisdom of the ultimate realm.

original: sarba ta th'a ga ta ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o //
analyzed: sarba ta th'a ga ta ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o //
translated: Sarva tathāgata is the five tathāgatas.

original: de rnams kyi nang na tsitta badzra ni mi bskyod pa nyid do //
analyzed: de rnams kyi nang na tsitta badzra ni mi bskyod pa nyid do //
translated: Among them, Cittavajra is Akṣobhya himself.

original: de'i sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes pa ni de'i rang bzhin bdag yin no zhes sngags kyi don rnam par spyod la nga rgyal dmigs par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes pa ni de'i rang bzhin bdag yin no zhes sngags kyi don rnam par spyod la nga rgyal dmigs par bya'o //
translated: His svabhāva ātmako ’ham, “I am of his nature,” is the meaning of the mantra. One should visualize the pride.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, etc.

analyzed: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rnam par snang bas na rnam par snang mdzad do //

analyzed: rdul dang bral ba'i gnas rdo rje ni me long lta bu'i ye shes te /

original: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
analyzed: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /

analyzed: 'di ni snga ma bzhin du sku byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags bka' stsal to //

analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /

analyzed: aom zhes pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so //

analyzed: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje ni rnam par snang mdzad de /

analyzed: de'i bdag nyid bdag yin no zhes nga rgyal dmigs par bya'o //

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, etc.

original: mnyam pa nyid gnyis su mi dmigs pa'i rdo rje ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid gnyis su mi dmigs pa'i rdo rje ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te /
translated: The vajra of the non-apprehension of the sameness of the two is the discriminating wisdom.

original: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
analyzed: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
translated: Having entered into the samadhi called that,

original: sngags 'di bka' stsal te //
analyzed: sngags 'di bka' stsal te //

analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta b'a ka badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /

original: zhes bya ba la aom ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la aom ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Om is the discriminating wisdom.

analyzed: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi @92b gsung rdo rje ni snang ba mtha' yas te /
translated: That is the vajra speech of all the Tathagatas, which is Amitabha.

original: de'i bdag nyid bdag yin no zhes sngags kyi don rnam par dpyod yang rgyal dmigs par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid bdag yin no zhes sngags kyi don rnam par dpyod yang rgyal dmigs par bya'o //
translated: I am of the nature of that, one should visualize the pride, analyzing the meaning of the mantra.

original: nye bar bsdu ba bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: nye bar bsdu ba bshad par bya ste /
translated: The summary will be explained.

original: rdo rje gsum ni aom la sogs pa'i yi ge gsum mo //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum ni aom la sogs pa'i yi ge gsum mo //
translated: The three vajras are the three syllables om, etc.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ni thugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ni thugs rdo rje la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The Tathagatas are the nature of Cittavajra, etc.

original: snying po yin pa'i phyir gsang ba'o //
analyzed: snying po yin pa'i phyir gsang ba'o //
translated: It is secret because it is the essence.

original: gnas ni yi ge phyi mo nye bar bsdus pas gsum du bsdus pas so //
analyzed: gnas ni yi ge phyi mo nye bar bsdus pas gsum du bsdus pas so //
translated: The place is the three places, because they are included in the three syllables.

original: gnas ni 'od gsal ba ste de nyid gang gis bsgom par bya ba de ni gnas kyis rnam par bsgom par bya ba'o //
analyzed: gnas ni 'od gsal ba ste de nyid gang gis bsgom par bya ba de ni gnas kyis rnam par bsgom par bya ba'o //
translated: The place is clear light, and that which is meditated upon by that is the meditation on the place.

original: de lta bu'i 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i sngags rnams mchog rab rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba ni de rnams nyid snying ga la sogs par dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i sngags rnams mchog rab rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba ni de rnams nyid snying ga la sogs par dgod par bya'o //
translated: The mantras just explained are to be accomplished by the best of adepts, and they are to be placed in the heart, etc.

original: sngags ni a'a li dang k'a li'o //
analyzed: sngags ni a'a li dang k'a li'o //
translated: The mantra is the vowels and consonants.

original: de rnams kyi mtshan ni rtags gsum mo //
analyzed: de rnams kyi mtshan ni rtags gsum mo //

original: de rnams kyis shin tu mtshan par bya ba yi ge gsum dgod par bya ste tshig gi don to //
analyzed: de rnams kyis shin tu mtshan par bya ba yi ge gsum dgod par bya ste tshig gi don to //
translated: They are to be well-signed, and the three syllables are to be placed, which is the meaning of the words.

original: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: That is the creation stage.

original: sngags de rnams brjod pas stobs kyis mi 'dod na yang rnal 'byor pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byin gyis brlab po //
analyzed: sngags de rnams brjod pas stobs kyis mi 'dod na yang rnal 'byor pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byin gyis brlab po //
translated: If the yogi does not wish to do so by force, the Tathagatas bless him.

original: rab tu byed pa las kyang ji skad du /
analyzed: rab tu byed pa las kyang ji skad du /
translated: And in the Prajñāpāramitāpiṇḍārtha it is said:

original: ri bo rgyal po'i rtse mo las //🔽gang zhig ltung bar 'gyur ba ste //
analyzed: ri bo rgyal po'i rtse mo las // gang zhig ltung bar 'gyur ba ste //
translated: From the peak of the king of mountains🔽one may fall,

original: lhung bar mi 'gyur snyam yang lhung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: lhung bar mi 'gyur snyam yang lhung bar 'gyur //
translated: and even if one thinks one will not fall, one will fall.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
translated: And so on.

original: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par shes pa gsum pa'o //
analyzed: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par shes pa gsum pa'o //
translated: Or else, all the Tathagatas are the third consciousness.

original: sku gsung thugs ni rang bzhin rnams so //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs ni rang bzhin rnams so //
translated: The body, speech and mind are the natures.

original: de rnams kyi rdo rje ni 'od gsal ba ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi rdo rje ni 'od gsal ba ste /
translated: Their vajra is clear light.

original: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sngags 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sngags 'di gsungs so //
translated: Having entered into the samadhi called that, he spoke this mantra.

original: aom ni snang ba'i ye shes so //
analyzed: aom ni snang ba'i ye shes so //
translated: Om is the gnosis of appearance.

original: sarba ta th'a ga ta ni snang ba mchod pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: sarba ta th'a ga ta ni snang ba mchod pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Sarvatathagatat is the gnosis of the appearance of worship.

original: tsitta badzra ni snang ba nye bar thob pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: tsitta badzra ni snang ba nye bar thob pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Cittabhadra is the gnosis of the appearance of attainment.

original: sva bh'a ba ni 'od gsal ba ste de'i bdag nyid bdag yin te sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa'o ;
analyzed: sva bh'a ba ni 'od gsal ba ste de'i bdag nyid bdag yin te sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa'o ;
translated: Svabhava is clear light, and I am its nature, the stage of the pure mind.

original: / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yi ge gsum ste /
analyzed: / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yi ge gsum ste /
translated: The three syllables of the Tathagata are the three seed syllables of the three vajras.

original: de rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim pas yan lag ma nyams pa'i bzlas pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim pas yan lag ma nyams pa'i bzlas pa ste /

original: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin du bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin du bshad pa'o //

original: aom ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi sa bon no//
analyzed: aom ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi sa bon no//
translated: Om is the seed syllable of Vairochana.

original: @93a * // sarba ta th'a ga ta ni yi ge a'o //
analyzed: @93a * // sarba ta th'a ga ta ni yi ge a'o //
translated: Sarva tathagata is the syllable a.

original: b'a ka badzra ni yi ge h'um ste gsung dang thugs tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: b'a ka badzra ni yi ge h'um ste gsung dang thugs tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: sva bh'a ba ni 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim pas rang bzhin te de yongs su spong bas ma ning gi bzlas pa ste /

original: de'i bdag nyid nga yin te rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid nga yin te rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: I am its nature, the stage of vajra recitation.

original: rdul dang bral ba'i gnas ni 'od gsal ba ste /
analyzed: rdul dang bral ba'i gnas ni 'od gsal ba ste /
translated: The abode free of dust is clear light.

original: de las byung ba'i rdo rje ni sgyu ma lta bu'i sku 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: de las byung ba'i rdo rje ni sgyu ma lta bu'i sku 'dzin pa ste /
translated: The vajra that arises from that is the holder of the body that is like an illusion.

original: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: That is the samadhi called “vajra-holder.”

original: aom ni chos kyi sku'o //
analyzed: aom ni chos kyi sku'o //
translated: Om is the dharmakaya.

original: sarba ta th'a ga ta ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
analyzed: sarba ta th'a ga ta ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
translated: Sarvatathagatakaya is the sambhogakaya.

original: k'a ya badzra ni sprul pa'i sku ste /
analyzed: k'a ya badzra ni sprul pa'i sku ste /
translated: Vajra is the nirmanakaya.

original: de ni thugs med pa ste ;
analyzed: de ni thugs med pa ste ;
translated: That is without mind,

original: sgyu ma'i skyes bu bzhin no //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i skyes bu bzhin no //
translated: like an illusory person.

original: sva bh'a ba ni de rnams kyi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: sva bh'a ba ni de rnams kyi rang bzhin te /

original: sgyu ma la sogs pa'i dpe dang chos mthun pa'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma la sogs pa'i dpe dang chos mthun pa'o //
translated: the similarity of the example of illusion and so forth.

original: de'i bdag nyid bdag yin te /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid bdag yin te /
translated: I am the nature of that,

original: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'o //

original: de nyid kyi phyir thugs dang sku dang gsung rdzogs pa'i phyir rim pa gsum po de dag bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir thugs dang sku dang gsung rdzogs pa'i phyir rim pa gsum po de dag bstan pa'o //
translated: For that very reason, in order to perfect mind, body, and speech, those three stages are taught.

original: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
analyzed: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
translated: In the Prajnaparamita it says:

original: rang bzhin snang ba'i dbye ba yis //
analyzed: rang bzhin snang ba'i dbye ba yis //
translated: By the division of the appearance of the nature,

original: de nyid bzhi pa la brten te //
analyzed: de nyid bzhi pa la brten te //
translated: depending on the fourth,

original: rnam pa gsum du gang bsgom pa //
analyzed: rnam pa gsum du gang bsgom pa //
translated: whatever is meditated on in three aspects,

original: des ni myur du 'bras bu thob //
analyzed: des ni myur du 'bras bu thob //
translated: by that, the result is quickly attained.

original: ces sems rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: ces sems rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Thus, the mind is pure.

original: de bzhin du /🔽rnam pa thams cad mchog dang ldan ;
analyzed: de bzhin du / rnam pa thams cad mchog dang ldan ;
translated: And similarly,🔽endowed with the best of all aspects,

original: / shin tu mdzes pa'i sku mnga' ba //
analyzed: / shin tu mdzes pa'i sku mnga' ba //
translated: having a body of great beauty,

original: de nyid slob ma la bstan pa //
analyzed: de nyid slob ma la bstan pa //
translated: that very [body] is shown to the disciple;

original: bdag la byin brlab de brjod pa'o //
analyzed: bdag la byin brlab de brjod pa'o //
translated: this is called the consecration of the self.

original: zhes lus rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: zhes lus rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Thus, the body is pure.

original: de bzhin du /
analyzed: de bzhin du /
translated: And similarly,

original: sngags kyi de nyid 'di gsal ba //
analyzed: sngags kyi de nyid 'di gsal ba //
translated: this reality of the mantra is clear,

original: gsung gi rdo rje sgrub pa ste /
analyzed: gsung gi rdo rje sgrub pa ste /
translated: the accomplishment of Vajra Speech;

original: ye shes gsum gyi dbye ba yis //
analyzed: ye shes gsum gyi dbye ba yis //
translated: by the division of the three intuitions,

original: sems tsam la ni nges sbyor bya //
analyzed: sems tsam la ni nges sbyor bya //
translated: one should apply oneself to mind only.

original: zhes bya ba ni gang rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gang rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Thus, that which is pure.

original: yang na sku rdo rje gsum po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: yang na sku rdo rje gsum po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Or else, the three vajras of the body, etc.

original: rdo rje gsum po ni sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge gsum mo //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum po ni sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge gsum mo //
translated: The three vajras are the three syllables of body, speech, and mind.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gsum mo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gsum mo //
translated: They are the three intuitions of the transcendent lords.

original: gsang ba ni sku gsum mo //
analyzed: gsang ba ni sku gsum mo //
translated: The secret is the three bodies.

original: gnas ni de dag thams cad yan lag ma nyams pa bzlas pa'o //
analyzed: gnas ni de dag thams cad yan lag ma nyams pa bzlas pa'o //
translated: The place is the recitation of all of them without loss of limbs.

original: gnas kyi rnam par bsgom par bya ba ni 'od gsal ba nyid du'o //
analyzed: gnas kyi rnam par bsgom par bya ba ni 'od gsal ba nyid du'o //
translated: The meditation on the place is as clear light.

original: gang zhe na mchog rab ni rim pa de dag gsum pos rdzogs pa'i rim pa rang bzhin can gyis so //
analyzed: gang zhe na mchog rab ni rim pa de dag gsum pos rdzogs pa'i rim pa rang bzhin can gyis so //
translated: What is that? The supreme is the nature of the perfection stage by means of those three stages.

original: sngags kyi mtshan nyid ni 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi mtshan nyid ni 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: The characteristic of mantra is clear light.

original: shin tu mtshan byas @93b ni de nyid las byung ba'i sgyu ma lta bu'i sku yang bsgrub par bya ba ste /
analyzed: shin tu mtshan byas @93b ni de nyid las byung ba'i sgyu ma lta bu'i sku yang bsgrub par bya ba ste /
translated: The well-characterized is the illusory body that arises from that, which is to be accomplished.

original: snga ma dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: snga ma dang sbyar ro //
translated: It is connected with the previous.

original: de ni rim pa gsum mo //
analyzed: de ni rim pa gsum mo //
translated: That is the three stages.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rin chen ni nam mkha'i mdzod kyis re ba thams cad rdzogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rin chen ni nam mkha'i mdzod kyis re ba thams cad rdzogs par byed pa'o //
translated: Then, etc. The jewel is the sky treasury, which fulfills all wishes.

original: de nyid dpal gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o /
analyzed: de nyid dpal gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o /
translated: He who has that glory is so-called.

original: sgron ma ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: sgron ma ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
translated: The lamp is the wisdom of equality.

original: de nyid snying po yin pa'i phyir rdo rje ste de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: de nyid snying po yin pa'i phyir rdo rje ste de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: That is the essence, and therefore the vajra. That is the samadhi called.

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba la /
translated: Om sarva tathagata anuraganavajra svabhava atmako ’ham.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gsum gyi nga rgyal gyis rang snang ba ni rigs lnga'i sngags kyis yan lag byin gyis brlab pa byas la shing la 'dzeg pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas 'khyud pa brgyad pa bya ba'i dus su sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
