translated: One should perform the consecration of the limbs with the mantras of the five clans, and at the time of performing the eight embraces, one should recite this mantra, according to the division of climbing the tree, and so forth.

original: de la aom ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: de la aom ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: There, Om is Great Vajradhara.

original: sarba ta th'a ga ta ni sangs rgyas gsum mo //
analyzed: sarba ta th'a ga ta ni sangs rgyas gsum mo //
translated: Sarva-tathagata is the three Buddhas.

original: aa hnu r'a ga na ni de rnams rjes su chags pa ste /
analyzed: aa hnu r'a ga na ni de rnams rjes su chags pa ste /
translated: Ahanuragana means the passion of those,

original: bde ba chen po bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba chen po bskyed pa'o //
translated: which is the generation of great bliss.

original: de nyid bskal pa'i bar du gnas pa'i phyir badzra ste /
analyzed: de nyid bskal pa'i bar du gnas pa'i phyir badzra ste /
translated: That itself is vajra, because it abides for an eon.

original: sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes pa ni de'i bdag nyid nga yin no zhes nga rgyal gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes pa ni de'i bdag nyid nga yin no zhes nga rgyal gzung bar bya'o //
translated: Svabhava-atmako ’ham means “I am of the nature of that,” and one should maintain that pride.

original: de ni rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de ni rang bzhin no //
translated: That is the nature.

original: yang na sgron ma rdo rje ni mngon par byang chub ste de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: yang na sgron ma rdo rje ni mngon par byang chub ste de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: Or else, the lamp-vajra is the manifest enlightenment, which is the samadhi called that.

original: aom ni chags pa'o //
analyzed: aom ni chags pa'o //
translated: Om is passion.

original: sarba ta th'a ga ta ni chags pa dang bral ba'o //🔽aa nu r'a ga na ni chags pa bar pa'o //
analyzed: sarba ta th'a ga ta ni chags pa dang bral ba'o // aa nu r'a ga na ni chags pa bar pa'o //
translated: Sarva-tathagata-nira-ra-ga-na is the third.🔽Anuraga-na is the fourth.

original: rdo rje ni bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni bzhi pa'o //
translated: Vajra is the fifth.

original: sva bh'a ba ni ril por 'dzin pa dang rjes su gzhig pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag go //
analyzed: sva bh'a ba ni ril por 'dzin pa dang rjes su gzhig pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag go //
translated: Sva-bha-va is the two samadhis of totalities and of liberations.

original: de'i bdag nyid bdag yin te mngon par byang chub kyi rim pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid bdag yin te mngon par byang chub kyi rim pa'o //
translated: That is the nature of the self, which is the stage of manifest enlightenment.

original: 'khyud pa byas nas ngang gi mchod pa bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'khyud pa byas nas ngang gi mchod pa bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Having embraced, in order to explain the natural worship,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he said, “Then, ” and so on.

original: gdon mi za ba ni bya ba nan tan grub pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: gdon mi za ba ni bya ba nan tan grub pa'i ye shes te /
translated: Amogha is the knowledge of successful action.

original: de nyid rdo rje 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i phyir te /
translated: That itself is the vajra, because it performs the welfare of living beings.

original: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: That is the samadhi.

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba 'di brjod cing /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba 'di brjod cing /
translated: Saying this, “Om sarva-tathagata-puja-vajra-sva-bha-va-atmako ’ham, ”

original: m'a ma k'i la sogs pa'i padmar rdo rje sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: m'a ma k'i la sogs pa'i padmar rdo rje sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: one should unite the vajra in the lotus of Mamaki and so on.

original: aom ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: aom ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: Om is the Great Vajradhara.

original: sarba ta th'a ga ta ni bha ga'i dbus su gnas pa'i rtsa rnams so //
analyzed: sarba ta th'a ga ta ni bha ga'i dbus su gnas pa'i rtsa rnams so //
translated: sarva-tathagata-nadi-bhaga-madhyasthita-nadi.

original: p'u dza ni mchod pa ste /
analyzed: p'u dza ni mchod pa ste /
translated: puja means worship.

original: de dag shu kras mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag shu kras mchod par bya'o //
translated: They should be worshipped with semen.

original: de dag gi rang bzhin bdag yin te rgyu yin no //🔽yang na gdon mi @94a * //
analyzed: de dag gi rang bzhin bdag yin te rgyu yin no // yang na gdon mi @94a * //
translated: I am their nature, the cause.

original: za ba'i rdo rje ni bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: za ba'i rdo rje ni bden pa gnyis dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: Or, the vajra is the concentration having the characteristic of the indivisibility of the two truths.

original: aom ni rdo rje bzlas pa'o //
analyzed: aom ni rdo rje bzlas pa'o //
translated: Om is the vajra repetition.

original: sarba ta th'a ga ta ni 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: sarba ta th'a ga ta ni 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: Sarva-tathagata is the clear light.

original: p'u dza ni sgyu ma lta bu'i sku'o //
analyzed: p'u dza ni sgyu ma lta bu'i sku'o //
translated: Puja is the illusory body.

original: badzra ni lhan cig skyes pa'o //
analyzed: badzra ni lhan cig skyes pa'o //
translated: Vajra is the innate.

original: de rnams kyi sva bh'a ba ni rang bzhin te mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sva bh'a ba ni rang bzhin te mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: Sva-bhava is the nature, the concentration of non-dwelling nirvana.

original: de nyid kyi bdag nyid nga yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi bdag nyid nga yin te /
translated: I am of that nature.

original: zung 'jug gi rim pa'o //
analyzed: zung 'jug gi rim pa'o //
translated: This is the stage of union.

original: mchod pa de nyid bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: mchod pa de nyid bshad par bya ste /
translated: That worship should be explained:

original: rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga //
analyzed: rtag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga //
translated: Always the five sense objects

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: and so forth.

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ni gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams so ;
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ni gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams so ;
translated: The five objects of desire are the goddesses such as Rūpavajrā.🔽Their buddhas are one’s own sense organs.

original: / de dag gi sangs rgyas ni rang gi dbang po rnams mchod par bya ba ni mnyes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: / de dag gi sangs rgyas ni rang gi dbang po rnams mchod par bya ba ni mnyes par bya ba'o //
translated: Worship means to please them.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: tshul bzhin zhes pa ni snga ma bzhin du khang pa sum brtsegs la sogs pa la bskyed pa'i rim pas de rnams rnam par bsams la spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pas so zhes ston to //
analyzed: tshul bzhin zhes pa ni snga ma bzhin du khang pa sum brtsegs la sogs pa la bskyed pa'i rim pas de rnams rnam par bsams la spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pas so zhes ston to //
translated: “Properly” indicates the creation stage, such as the three-storied house, and so on.

original: rtag tu zhes pa ni rgyun ma chad pa ste /
analyzed: rtag tu zhes pa ni rgyun ma chad pa ste /
translated: “Always” means continuously.

original: gzhan du na bsgom pa brjed pa'i phyir ro //🔽lnga ni yum rnams te de rnams gang zhig nye bar sdud par byed pa de ni de'i rnam pa lnga ste /
analyzed: gzhan du na bsgom pa brjed pa'i phyir ro // lnga ni yum rnams te de rnams gang zhig nye bar sdud par byed pa de ni de'i rnam pa lnga ste /
translated: Otherwise, one would forget the meditation.🔽The five are the mothers.

original: rnam par shes pa rnams so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa rnams so //
translated: The five consciousnesses are the ones that gather them.

original: de rnams mchod pa ni yul 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de rnams mchod pa ni yul 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir /
translated: Worship means to satisfy the objects of desire.

original: myur du sangs rgyas nyid ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: myur du sangs rgyas nyid ni rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will quickly attain buddhahood, the state of Great Vajradhara.

original: de ni las kyi rgyal ba mchog go //
analyzed: de ni las kyi rgyal ba mchog go //
translated: This is the supreme victory of action.

original: yang na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ni mig rgyu dang / du ba dang / srin bu me khyer ba dang / mar me dang / sprin med pa'i nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i snang ba rnams so //
analyzed: yang na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ni mig rgyu dang / du ba dang / srin bu me khyer ba dang / mar me dang / sprin med pa'i nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i snang ba rnams so //
translated: Or else, the five qualities of desire are the appearances which are like a mirage, smoke, a firefly, a lamp, and a cloudless sky.

original: de dag gis sangs rgyas ni 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid mchod par bya ba ni mtshon par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gis sangs rgyas ni 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid mchod par bya ba ni mtshon par bya'o //
translated: By them, the Buddha, the reality of clear light, is to be worshipped, that is, is to be perceived.

original: tshul bzhin du sams  rtse gcig pa nyid du'o //
analyzed: tshul bzhin du sams  rtse gcig pa nyid du'o //
translated: Properly, with the mind one-pointed.

original: rtag tu nges pa ni dus mtshams dang / mtshan mo dang / nyin mo'i bdag nyid kyis so //
analyzed: rtag tu nges pa ni dus mtshams dang / mtshan mo dang / nyin mo'i bdag nyid kyis so //
translated: Always, by day and by night.

original: mchod pa rnam pa lnga ni 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'dod chags bar pa dang / ril por 'dzin pa dang rjes su gzhig pa rnams so //
analyzed: mchod pa rnam pa lnga ni 'dod chags dang 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'dod chags bar pa dang / ril por 'dzin pa dang rjes su gzhig pa rnams so //
translated: The five kinds of worship are passion, dispassion, middling passion, global grasping, and subsequent destruction.

original: de dag mchod pa ni skom pa ste /
analyzed: de dag mchod pa ni skom pa ste /
translated: By them, one is quickly satisfied.

original: des myur du sangs rgyas nyid ni mngon par byang chub thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: des myur du sangs rgyas nyid ni mngon par byang chub thob par 'gyur te /
translated: By that, one quickly attains manifest enlightenment, buddhahood.

original: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni nye bar @94b bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni nye bar @94b bsdus pa'o //
translated: The stage of manifest enlightenment is the summary, beginning with the Blessed One.

original: da ni gnyi ga'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rim pa gnyis kyi sgo nas bsgom pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni gnyi ga'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rim pa gnyis kyi sgo nas bsgom pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the meditation of both yogis by way of the two stages is to be explained.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la go sla'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la go sla'o //
translated: After that, etc. is easy to understand.🔽The body focused on mantra

original: sngags la dmigs pa'i lus dang ni //
analyzed: sngags la dmigs pa'i lus dang ni //
translated: and🔽the three worlds are summoned,🔽and the supreme, excellent power

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: is attained, and the mind is delighted.

original: sngags kyi stong pa nyid ni sngags so //
analyzed: sngags kyi stong pa nyid ni sngags so //
translated: The mantra emptiness is the mantra.

original: de nyid kyis dmigs pa ni stong pa nyid de kho na nyid bsam pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis dmigs pa ni stong pa nyid de kho na nyid bsam pa'o //
translated: The focus on that is the contemplation of just that emptiness.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How is it?

original: lus ngag yid gsum po dang / khams gsum pa bskul ba ni mi snang bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: lus ngag yid gsum po dang / khams gsum pa bskul ba ni mi snang bar byed pa'o //
translated: The three bodies, speech, and mind, and the three worlds are summoned, and they become invisible.

original: de'i tshe dngos grub rab mchog ni don dam pa'i dngos grub /
analyzed: de'i tshe dngos grub rab mchog ni don dam pa'i dngos grub /
translated: At that time, the supreme, excellent power is the ultimate power.

original: yid dga' ba ni rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi ngo bo yid rnam par dag par byed par 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
analyzed: yid dga' ba ni rnam par shes pa brgyad kyi ngo bo yid rnam par dag par byed par 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
translated: The delighted mind is the accomplishment of the purification of the mind, the nature of the eight consciousnesses.

original: de nas sems ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa la rnam pa ste de la dmigs pa ni de'i steng du yi ge gsum la sogs pa'i sa bon dgod cing /
analyzed: de nas sems ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa la rnam pa ste de la dmigs pa ni de'i steng du yi ge gsum la sogs pa'i sa bon dgod cing /
translated: The focus on that is the placement of the seed syllables such as the three syllables on top of that.

original: bdag med pa ni sa bon gyi rnam par rtog pa yongs su spangs pas so //
analyzed: bdag med pa ni sa bon gyi rnam par rtog pa yongs su spangs pas so //
translated: The selflessness is the complete abandonment of the conception of the seed syllables.

original: ngag dang lus kyi nye bar mtshon pa'i yid kyang yin te /
analyzed: ngag dang lus kyi nye bar mtshon pa'i yid kyang yin te /
translated: The mind is also indicated by the body and speech.

original: de nas lus ngag yid kyi ngo bo sa bon de rnams la khams gsum pa thim par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas lus ngag yid kyi ngo bo sa bon de rnams la khams gsum pa thim par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should meditate on the dissolution of the three realms into those seed syllables, which are the essence of body, speech, and mind.

original: de'i rjes la phyag mtshan dang sa bon yongs su gyur pa las sbyor ba rnam gsum ni dam tshig dang ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' dang ldan pa'i sku bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la phyag mtshan dang sa bon yongs su gyur pa las sbyor ba rnam gsum ni dam tshig dang ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' dang ldan pa'i sku bsgom par bya'o //
translated: After that, one should meditate on the form endowed with the pledge being, the wisdom being, and the concentration being, which arises from the complete transformation of the insignia and the seed syllables.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: nam mkha' bzhin du mnyam pa'i gnas //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin du mnyam pa'i gnas //🔽zhes bya ba la /
translated: The abode of equality like space.

original: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid gang la yod pa de ni nam mkha' bzhin du mnyam pa ste chos 'byung gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid gang la yod pa de ni nam mkha' bzhin du mnyam pa ste chos 'byung gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: He who is equal to space is equal to space, the seal of the source of phenomena.

original: de nyid gnas ni gzhi gang la yod pa de lta bu bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid gnas ni gzhi gang la yod pa de lta bu bsgom par bya'o //
translated: That which is the abode of that is the ground, which should be meditated upon in that way.

original: chos 'byung gi phyag rgya'i steng na gnas pa'i sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i gzhal yas khang pa'i nang na gnas pa'o zhes ston to //
analyzed: chos 'byung gi phyag rgya'i steng na gnas pa'i sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i gzhal yas khang pa'i nang na gnas pa'o zhes ston to //
translated: It is taught that the abode of the seal of the source of phenomena is the celestial mansion adorned with various ornaments, within which one abides.

original: de'i rjes la lus ngag yid ni yi ge gsum ste /
analyzed: de'i rjes la lus ngag yid ni yi ge gsum ste /
translated: After that, the body, speech, and mind are the three syllables.

original: de rnams dmigs pa ni bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams dmigs pa ni bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Those should be visualized.

original: ngo bo nyid ni bstod pa dang / mchod pa dang / bdud rtsi myong ba ste /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid ni bstod pa dang / mchod pa dang / bdud rtsi myong ba ste /
translated: The essence is the praise, offering, and tasting of elixir.

original: de rnams kyang bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyang bya'o //
translated: Those should also be performed.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: dmigs su med ces pa ni gsum mi dmigs pas so //
analyzed: dmigs su med ces pa ni gsum mi dmigs pas so //
translated: Without reference means without reference to the three.

original: de'i rjes la sngags kyi lus ni sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi lus te /
analyzed: de'i rjes la sngags kyi lus ni sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi lus te /
translated: After that, the mantra body is the body of the nature of the three beings.

original: de dang sbyor ba ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya ma dang / @95a * //
analyzed: de dang sbyor ba ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya ma dang / @95a * //
translated: The union with that is the wisdom consort.

original: snyoms par zhugs te mar gyi bum pa bzhin du ro gcig par gyur pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: snyoms par zhugs te mar gyi bum pa bzhin du ro gcig par gyur pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on the union, which is of one taste like a pot of ghee.

original: de'i rjes la byang chub med pa'i rnam pa gzung pa'i rnam par rtog pa med cing bsgom pa med pa ni dkyil 'khor pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'o //🔽de'i rjes la khyod ni rdo rje sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i lha mo'i glu rnams kyis bskul bas sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir dpyad pa ni gsan nas mdor na zhes pa ni cig car du sku gsung thugs ni sems dpa' gsum pos mtshan par🔽bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i rjes la byang chub med pa'i rnam pa gzung pa'i rnam par rtog pa med cing bsgom pa med pa ni dkyil 'khor pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'o // de'i rjes la khyod ni rdo rje sems zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i lha mo'i glu rnams kyis bskul bas sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir dpyad pa ni gsan nas mdor na zhes pa ni cig car du sku gsung thugs ni sems dpa' gsum pos mtshan par bya ba ste /
translated: After that, the absence of the aspect of enlightenment, the absence of the apprehension of the conceptualization of meditation, is the absence of the conceptualization of the maṇḍala.🔽After that, one should analyze the request to perform the benefit of sentient beings by the songs of the goddesses, “You are Vajrasattva,” and so on.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid can sngags kyi sku bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid can sngags kyi sku bsgom par bya'o //
translated: In brief, one should meditate on the mantra body, which is characterized by the body, speech, and mind of the three heroes.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: byang chub ni rang snang ba'i shes rab ste /
analyzed: byang chub ni rang snang ba'i shes rab ste /
translated: Enlightenment is the wisdom of self-appearance.

original: de dang sbyor ba gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin no //
analyzed: de dang sbyor ba gang la yod pa de ni de bzhin no //
translated: That which is endowed with that is just so.

original: de bzhin du sngags kyi dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyis so //
analyzed: de bzhin du sngags kyi dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyis so //
translated: In the same way, the mantra circle.

original: brtags pa ni kun du yongs su bskor ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: brtags pa ni kun du yongs su bskor ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The imagined should be cultivated in the samādhi of the complete circle.

original: 'dir ni re zhig bskyed pa'i rim pas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa ste /
analyzed: 'dir ni re zhig bskyed pa'i rim pas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa ste /
translated: Here, the samādhi of Mahāvajradhara is taught by the stage of creation.

original: de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, the samādhis of Vairocana and so on should be cultivated.

original: de ni dang po sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog dang / las rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin rnams so //
analyzed: de ni dang po sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog dang / las rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin rnams so //
translated: Those are the samādhis of the first union, the supreme victor mandala, and the supreme victor action.

original: yang na sngags ni dbang po dang yul rnams la dmigs pa ni phan tshun du yang dag par bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: yang na sngags ni dbang po dang yul rnams la dmigs pa ni phan tshun du yang dag par bsdus pa'o //
translated: Or else, the mantra is the mutual perfect inclusion of the objects of the senses.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is that like?

original: lus ngag yid bskul ba ni ro gcig par gyur par bya'o //
analyzed: lus ngag yid bskul ba ni ro gcig par gyur par bya'o //
translated: The body, speech, and mind should be made into one taste.

original: de'i rjes la dngos grub rab mchog ni bcu po de rnams gcig tu byas pas de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa'i rang bzhin can yid ni rtog pa dang / dpyod pa dang / dga' ba dang / bde ba rnams kyis yid dga' bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la dngos grub rab mchog ni bcu po de rnams gcig tu byas pas de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa'i rang bzhin can yid ni rtog pa dang / dpyod pa dang / dga' ba dang / bde ba rnams kyis yid dga' bar byed pa'o //
translated: After that, the supreme accomplishment is the supreme aspiration of the ten, which is the mind of the Tathagata, which is delighted by conception, investigation, joy, and pleasure.

original: mgu bar ni sems rtse cig par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: mgu bar ni sems rtse cig par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: The mind is delighted by the nature of aspiration.

original: dngos grub ni ting nge 'dzin la slob pa nas bsgrub par bya ba ni bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos grub ni ting nge 'dzin la slob pa nas bsgrub par bya ba ni bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The accomplishment is the cultivation of the practice of samadhi.

original: sems ni byang chub kyi sems te /
analyzed: sems ni byang chub kyi sems te /
translated: The mind is the mind of enlightenment.

original: de la dmigs pa ni thig le'i ngo bor gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa ni thig le'i ngo bor gnas pa'o //
translated: The focus on that is the essence of the bindu.

original: de nyid ngag ni rdo rje'i dag gis so //
analyzed: de nyid ngag ni rdo rje'i dag gis so //
translated: That itself is the vajra speech.

original: lus ni sna'i rtse mor dgod cing bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: lus ni sna'i rtse mor dgod cing bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The body is placed at the tip of the nose and cultivated.

original: de nas sbyor ba rnam gsum ni 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang ldang ba'i rim pas bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas sbyor ba rnam gsum ni 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang ldang ba'i rim pas bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Next, the three yogas are to be accomplished through the process of entering, abiding, and rising.

original: ji lta bu zhe @95b na ;
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe @95b na ;
translated: What is it like?

original: nam mkha' ni dkyil 'khor bzhi ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' ni dkyil 'khor bzhi ste /
translated: Space is the four mandalas.

original: de dag las mnyam pa ni g-yas la sogs pa'i spro ba'i rim pas de'i rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: de dag las mnyam pa ni g-yas la sogs pa'i spro ba'i rim pas de'i rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsgom pa'o //
translated: Among them, the equal is the meditation on the Tathagatas of that class by the process of emission to the right and so forth.

original: gnas ni de nyid kyi gnas te yungs kar gyi 'bru'i tshad tsam thig le bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: gnas ni de nyid kyi gnas te yungs kar gyi 'bru'i tshad tsam thig le bsam par bya'o //
translated: The place is the place of that very [Tathagata], and one should imagine a drop the size of a mustard seed.

original: de'i rjes la thig le de nyid spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rim pas bstan par gyur cing rdo rje la sogs pa'i sna ru 'dzin par lus dang ngag dang sems dmigs zhes pa ni lus la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid dmigs par mi 'gyur
analyzed: de'i rjes la thig le de nyid spro ba dang bsdu ba'i rim pas bstan par gyur cing rdo rje la sogs pa'i sna ru 'dzin par lus dang ngag dang sems dmigs zhes pa ni lus la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid dmigs par mi 'gyur
translated: After that, by the process of emission and gathering of that very drop, one should imagine the vajra and so forth, and the body, speech, and mind are not imagined, as it is said.

original: to / rnam par rtog pa'i 'od gsal ba mngon du bya'o zhes ston to //
analyzed: to / rnam par rtog pa'i 'od gsal ba mngon du bya'o zhes ston to //

original: thig le de nyid las sku la sogs pa'i rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi nam mkha'i khams spro ba'i rim pas yongs su gang zhig / sngags kyi lus su sbyor ba la //
analyzed: thig le de nyid las sku la sogs pa'i rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi nam mkha'i khams spro ba'i rim pas yongs su gang zhig / sngags kyi lus su sbyor ba la //

analyzed: de nas thams cad yongs su spangs la /
translated: Then, having abandoned everything,

analyzed: sngags kyi bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / brtags pa ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa ste /

analyzed: de rnams ro gcig par gyur pa'i mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o //

original: de ni rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: de ni rnal 'byor ro //

analyzed: yang na sngags ni a'a li dang k'a li'i ngo bo la sogs pa'i ksha'i mtha' can te yi ge lnga bcu'o //

analyzed: gtso bor gyur pa'i phyir bzhi kho na blang ba dang / sngags thams cad kyi gtso bo yi ge gsum mo ;

translated: Thus, there are seventy-two syllables,🔽which are the essence of the seventy-two thousand channels.

analyzed: gang gi stong re re ni rtsa re re'i gco bor gyur pa ste /

analyzed: de'i phyir rtsa re re de nyid la aa la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams dbang byed pa'o //

analyzed: de la phung po lnga dang skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bco brgyad dang rtsa'i rnam par shes pa ste /

analyzed: mtshan mo dang nyin mo'i dbye ba'am /

analyzed: thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin gyis de rnams bdun cu rtsa gnyis su gyur pa'o //
translated: or by the nature of means and insight, they become seventy-two.

analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi rang bzhin rtsa rnams yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'o //
translated: Therefore, the Blessed One said that the nature of the aggregates, elements, and sense bases is the channels.

original: yang na sgo dgu ni mig la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: yang na sgo dgu ni mig la sogs pa'o //
translated: Or, the nine doors are the eyes, etc.

original: lus dag yid ni gsum mo //
analyzed: lus dag yid ni gsum mo //
translated: The body is the three: the anus, the genitals, and the mouth.

original: de rnams bsdus nas bcu gnyis yin no //
analyzed: de rnams bsdus nas bcu gnyis yin no //
translated: These are combined to make twelve.

analyzed: de la ma las skyes ba ni cha gsum dang / pha las skyes pa yang cha gsum ste cha drug dang ldan pa'i gong bu yin no//
translated: In this case, the embryo has six parts: three parts from the mother and three parts from the father.

original: de la ma las skyes pa'i cha gsum ni phags  pa dang sha dang khrag go //
analyzed: de la ma las skyes pa'i cha gsum ni phags  pa dang sha dang khrag go //

analyzed: pha las skyes pa'i cha gsum ni rtsa rgyus dang rus pa dang shu kra'o //
translated: The three parts from the father are bone, marrow, and semen.

analyzed: de'i phyir sngar bshad pa'i sgo la sogs pa'i rdzas bcu gnyis po re re khams drug dang ldan pa yin pas bdun cu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the twelve substances, such as the doors explained above, each have six elements, making seventy-two.

original: de rnams nyid rtsa bdun cu rtsa gnyis yin te sgra'i rtse mo'i rtse mo yin pas rtsa re re stong stong gtso 'khor yin no //
analyzed: de rnams nyid rtsa bdun cu rtsa gnyis yin te sgra'i rtse mo'i rtse mo yin pas rtsa re re stong stong gtso 'khor yin no //
translated: Those are the seventy-two channels, and since they are the tips of the tips of the sounds, each channel has a thousand principal and retinue [channels].

original: de'i phyir bdun khri nyis stong du 'gyur te //
analyzed: de'i phyir bdun khri nyis stong du 'gyur te //
translated: Therefore, there are seventy-two thousand.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rigs brgya'i dbye ba bzhin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rigs brgya'i dbye ba bzhin no //

original: de lta bu'i sngags ni yi ge rnams te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i sngags ni yi ge rnams te /

original: de la dmigs pa ni rtsa'i ngo bor rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa ni rtsa'i ngo bor rtogs pa'o //

analyzed: rtsa de rnams kyang lus dag yid kyis bskul ba ni lus la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis khams gsum pa khyab cing gnas pa'o //
translated: Those channels pervade and exist in the three realms with the nature of the body, speech, and mind.

analyzed: rtsa de rnams nyid dngos grub rab mchog ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dngos grub grub par bya ba ni 'grub par byed pa ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How does the accomplishment of the supreme siddhi, the connate state, of those very channels occur?

original: yid @96b ni rnal 'byor ba'i shes pa la /
analyzed: yid @96b ni rnal 'byor ba'i shes pa la /
translated: The mind is the consciousness of the yogin.

original: dga' ba ni bde ba ster ba'o //
analyzed: dga' ba ni bde ba ster ba'o //
translated: Joy is the bestowal of bliss.

original: de nyid kyi phyir mgu ba ni mi gtong ba zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mgu ba ni mi gtong ba zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //

original: ji ltar zhe na sems la dmigs pa ni yid las byung ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na sems la dmigs pa ni yid las byung ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa /
translated: How? The object of observation of the mind is the perfection of wisdom arisen from the mind.

original: bdag med pa ni gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa'i phyi rol gyi brtags pa'i phyir phyag rgya sel ba'i mtshan nyid can lus dang ngag gi rang bzhin ni sku'i rnam pa lta bu dang bcas pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag med pa ni gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa'i phyi rol gyi brtags pa'i phyir phyag rgya sel ba'i mtshan nyid can lus dang ngag gi rang bzhin ni sku'i rnam pa lta bu dang bcas pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The selflessness is the selflessness of persons and phenomena. The external is the characteristic of the seal to be eliminated. The nature of body and speech is to be cultivated with the appearance of a body.

original: sbyor ba rnam gsum ni bcu po gsum gyis sbyor ba gang la yod pa de ni sbyor ba rnam pa gsum ste zla ba'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba rnam gsum ni bcu po gsum gyis sbyor ba gang la yod pa de ni sbyor ba rnam pa gsum ste zla ba'o //
translated: The three kinds of yoga are the three sets of ten. That in which they are present is the three kinds of yoga.

analyzed: sbyor ba rnam gsum de la nam mkha' mnyam nyid ni lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba'i ngo bo rdo rje lus med gnas pa bzhi bsgom par bya'o //
translated: In those three kinds of yoga, the equality of space is the essence of the innate bliss, the vajra body, abiding in the four places.

original: 'di skad bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad pa yin te /

original: yar ngo'i phyogs go bzlog pa nas brtsams te /
analyzed: yar ngo'i phyogs go bzlog pa nas brtsams te /

analyzed: rdo rje phreng ba las kyang /

analyzed: rim pa 'di gnyis kyis rtsa kun du spyod pa'i rim pas de kho na nyid thob na de'i tshe byang chub med pa ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rnam par rtog pa med pa'o //
translated: If reality is attained by the stage of the practice of the nāḍīs through these two stages, then at that time there is no enlightenment, which is the absence of conceptualization of the jñānamudrā.

original: sgom pa med pa ni yi ge phyi mo yi ge'i rang bzhin rtsa'i sgom pa yang med do //
analyzed: sgom pa med pa ni yi ge phyi mo yi ge'i rang bzhin rtsa'i sgom pa yang med do //
translated: There is no meditation, which is the absence of the meditation of the nāḍīs that are the nature of the seed syllables.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As is said:

original: de srid du ma chos rnams byung //
analyzed: de srid du ma chos rnams byung //
translated: As long as phenomena arise,

original: ji srid yid ni som nyi ste //
analyzed: ji srid yid ni som nyi ste //
translated: As long as the mind is doubtful,

original: dga' ba'i 'khor lo rab byung na //
analyzed: dga' ba'i 'khor lo rab byung na //
translated: When the wheel of joy arises,

original: dam chos der min rim pa med //
analyzed: dam chos der min rim pa med //
translated: The sacred Dharma is not in stages.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de lta bu'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ma dang snyoms par zhugs pa las byung ba'i lhan cig skyes pa'i bde pa rnam par dpyad nas /
analyzed: de lta bu'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ma dang snyoms par zhugs pa las byung ba'i lhan cig skyes pa'i bde pa rnam par dpyad nas /
translated: The “seal” is the consort of the gnosis, and the “union” is the coemergent bliss that arises from that union.

original: mdor na zhes pa ni nye bar bsdus pas sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid ni nye bar mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: mdor na zhes pa ni nye bar bsdus pas sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan nyid ni nye bar mtshon pa'o //
translated: “ In brief” is a summary, and the “characteristics of body, speech, and mind” are indicated.

original: de'i tshe rnal 'byor bas byang chub sbyor ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ngo bo sngags kyis brtags pa ni ngo bo med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe rnal 'byor bas byang chub sbyor ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ngo bo sngags kyis brtags pa ni ngo bo med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: At that time, the yogin should meditate on the application to enlightenment, which is the imagination of the mantra as the essence of Great Vajradhara, endowed with the gnosis that is without essence.

original: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa dang 'bras bu dag go //
analyzed: de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa dang 'bras bu dag go //
translated: That is the creation stage and its result.

original: da ni dbye ba gzhan gyis phra mo'i rnal 'byor bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni dbye ba gzhan gyis phra mo'i rnal 'byor bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the subtle yoga will be explained by another division.

original: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin //
analyzed: de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin //
translated: Then, the glorious Vajradhara,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /🔽rdo rje 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin pa ste bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / rdo rje 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin pa ste bskyed pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: and so on.🔽Vajradhara is the creation stage.

original: rdo rje ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi de kho na nyid de /
analyzed: rdo rje ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi de kho na nyid de /
translated: Vajra is reality, which is the nature of the five gnoses.

original: de 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin te rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin te rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: Since one holds that, it is vajra-holder, which is the completion stage.

original: rdo rje ni stong pa nyid de ;
analyzed: rdo rje ni stong pa nyid de ;
translated: The vajra is emptiness,

original: de 'dzin pas rdo rje 'dzin pa ste dang po sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de 'dzin pas rdo rje 'dzin pa ste dang po sbyor ba'o //
translated: and since one holds that, it is vajra-holder, which is the first stage.

original: rdo rje ni sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo ste /
analyzed: rdo rje ni sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo ste /
translated: The vajra is the nature of the three beings,

original: de 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin te /
analyzed: de 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin te /
translated: and since one holds that, it is vajra-holder,

original: dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog go //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor rgyal ba mchog go //
translated: which is the supreme victor mandala.

original: rdo rje ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams te /
analyzed: rdo rje ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams te /
translated: The vajra is the mandala deities,

original: de dag 'dzin pa ni spro bar byed pas na rdo rje 'dzin te las @97b kyi rgyal ba mchog go //
analyzed: de dag 'dzin pa ni spro bar byed pas na rdo rje 'dzin te las @97b kyi rgyal ba mchog go //
translated: and since one holds them by emanating them, it is vajra-holder, which is the supreme victor karma.

original: rdo rje ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje ni rdo rje'i bzlas pa ste /
translated: The vajra is the vajra repetition,

original: de nyid 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim pas 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin te rdo rje'i bzlas pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim pas 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin te rdo rje'i bzlas pa'o //
translated: and since one holds it by the process of entering and so on, it is vajra-holder, which is the vajra repetition.

original: rdo rje ni rnam par shes pa gsum te /
analyzed: rdo rje ni rnam par shes pa gsum te /
translated: The vajra is the three consciousnesses,

original: de rnams 'od gsal ba la zhugs pas 'dzin pa ni rnam par dag pa ste rdo rje 'dzin to //
analyzed: de rnams 'od gsal ba la zhugs pas 'dzin pa ni rnam par dag pa ste rdo rje 'dzin to //
translated: and since one holds them by entering into clear light, it is vajra-holder, which is the pure state.

original: de ni sems rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: de ni sems rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: That is the pure mind.

original: rdo rje ni mi g-yo ba'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: rdo rje ni mi g-yo ba'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: Vajra is the illusion-like meditative stabilization of the immutable.

original: de nyid 'dzin pa ni 'od gsal ba las spro bar byed pas na rdo rje 'dzin te bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid 'dzin pa ni 'od gsal ba las spro bar byed pas na rdo rje 'dzin te bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'o //
translated: The holder of that is the vajra holder who emanates from the clear light, that is, the self-consecration.

original: rdo rje ni 'dod chags la sogs pa rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: rdo rje ni 'dod chags la sogs pa rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: Vajra is the three, passion and so forth.

original: de rnams 'dzin pa ni bzhi ba'i man dag gis mi snang bar byed pas na rdo rje 'dzin te mngon par byang chub pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams 'dzin pa ni bzhi ba'i man dag gis mi snang bar byed pas na rdo rje 'dzin te mngon par byang chub pa'o //
translated: The holder of those is the vajra holder who makes those invisible by the fourth initiation, that is, manifest enlightenment.

original: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pas shes na rdo rje 'dzin te zung 'jug go //
analyzed: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi kun rdzob dang don dam pa dbyer med pas shes na rdo rje 'dzin te zung 'jug go //
translated: The vajra holder who knows the indivisibility of the conventional and the ultimate, which have the character of non-abiding nirvana, is the union.

original: pa ni thabs so //
analyzed: pa ni thabs so //
translated: Pa is the method.

original: dzra ni shes rab bo //
analyzed: dzra ni shes rab bo //
translated: Jra is wisdom.

original: de dag gnyi ga 'dzin pa ni yang dag par sbyor bas na rdo rje 'dzin te rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de dag gnyi ga 'dzin pa ni yang dag par sbyor bas na rdo rje 'dzin te rang bzhin no //
translated: The holder of those two is the vajra holder who is the correct union, that is, the nature.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje dang rdo rje ni rdo rje dag ste gsungs pa rnams kyi byed tshig gcig la gcig lus par 'gyur ro zhes bya bas /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje dang rdo rje ni rdo rje dag ste gsungs pa rnams kyi byed tshig gcig la gcig lus par 'gyur ro zhes bya bas /
translated: Likewise, vajra and vajra would be a single verbal action with two subjects.

original: rdo rje'i sgra gcig ni bye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rdo rje'i sgra gcig ni bye bar 'gyur //
translated: One vajra would be split.

original: gnyis pa ni lus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnyis pa ni lus par 'gyur ro //
translated: The second would be the subject.

original: des ni don 'di yin te gcig ni rdo rje rdo rje kho na'o //
analyzed: des ni don 'di yin te gcig ni rdo rje rdo rje kho na'o //
translated: This is the meaning: One vajra is just a vajra.

original: gnyis pa ni rdo rjes nang na mtshan pa'i phyir rdo rje ste padma'o //
analyzed: gnyis pa ni rdo rjes nang na mtshan pa'i phyir rdo rje ste padma'o //
translated: The second is a vajra because it is marked with vajras, that is, lotuses.

original: skyes bu'i rtags mtshungs mi yi sna dag ni //
analyzed: skyes bu'i rtags mtshungs mi yi sna dag ni //
translated: The two noses of a man, which have the same sign,

original: 'dra ba'i pags pas g-yogs su byas pa ste //
analyzed: 'dra ba'i pags pas g-yogs su byas pa ste //
translated: are covered with skin that is similar.

original: 'jam zhing phra ba'i dkyil 'khor rtse mo can //
analyzed: 'jam zhing phra ba'i dkyil 'khor rtse mo can //
translated: They have a soft, fine, pointed center,

original: me tog snying po'i kha sbyor nang dang mtshungs //
analyzed: me tog snying po'i kha sbyor nang dang mtshungs //
translated: like the inside of a flower bud.

original: rgya chen dpal gyi be'u 'dab mtshungs pa yi //
analyzed: rgya chen dpal gyi be'u 'dab mtshungs pa yi //
translated: The two breasts, which are like the petals of a glorious cowrie shell,

original: yan lag can gyi spyi bo'i cha la brten //
analyzed: yan lag can gyi spyi bo'i cha la brten //
translated: are supported on the head of the body.

original: bud med dbang po gnyis po de 'dod pas //🔽sor mo'i rtse mos de ni shin tu btsir //
analyzed: bud med dbang po gnyis po de 'dod pas // sor mo'i rtse mos de ni shin tu btsir //
translated: The two organs of a woman, which are desired,

original: zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: are squeezed with the tips of the fingers.

original: rdo rje dang padma de dag 'dzin pa ni bsdus pa nas rgyu'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dang padma de dag 'dzin pa ni bsdus pa nas rgyu'o //
translated: The vajra and lotus holders are the cause from the concise.

original: rdo rje ni h'um dang phat la sogs pa char rengs pa dang bskyed pa'i sa bon de dag dgod cing 'dzin par byed pas na rdo rje 'dzin de las so //
analyzed: rdo rje ni h'um dang phat la sogs pa char rengs pa dang bskyed pa'i sa bon de dag dgod cing 'dzin par byed pas na rdo rje 'dzin de las so //
translated: The vajra is the seed syllable of the wrathful and peaceful deities, such as hūṃ and phaṭ, which are placed and held.

original: rdo rje ni rang gi rig pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: rdo rje ni rang gi rig pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te /
translated: Vajra is the nondual gnosis of one’s vidyā.

original: de 'dzin pa ni nyams su myong bas rdo rje 'dzin te 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: de 'dzin pa ni nyams su myong bas rdo rje 'dzin te 'bras bu'o //
translated: The holder is the vajra holder who experiences the result.

original: rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob pa'i rgyur gyur pas so sor sdud pa la @98a * //
analyzed: rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob pa'i rgyur gyur pas so sor sdud pa la @98a * //
translated: Vajra is the cause of attaining the stage of Mahāvajradhara.

original: sogs pa'i yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor de 'dzin pa ni rtag tu goms pas na rdo rje 'dzin te rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: sogs pa'i yan lag drug gi rnal 'byor de 'dzin pa ni rtag tu goms pas na rdo rje 'dzin te rnal 'byor ro //
translated: The holder of that yoga of the six branches, such as prāṇāyāma, is the vajra holder who is always familiarized with the result.

original: rdo rje ni dam tshig chen po lnga ste /
analyzed: rdo rje ni dam tshig chen po lnga ste /
translated: Vajra is the five great pledges.

original: de 'dzin pa ni ston pa'am spyod pas na rdo rje 'dzin te sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de 'dzin pa ni ston pa'am spyod pas na rdo rje 'dzin te sgrub pa'o //
translated: The holder of that is the vajra holder who teaches or practices the result.

original: dpal ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dag gang la yod pa de ni dpal ldan no //
analyzed: dpal ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dag gang la yod pa de ni dpal ldan no //
translated: Glorious means endowed with the glory of the accumulations of merit and wisdom.🔽All tathāgatas means the five principal families.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun ni rigs kyi gtso bo lngas mchod pa ni mchod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun ni rigs kyi gtso bo lngas mchod pa ni mchod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Worship means worship.

original: de bas na sangs rgyas kun ni /
analyzed: de bas na sangs rgyas kun ni /
translated: Therefore, all buddhas means

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi mchog ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams te /
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi mchog ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams te /
translated: the perfect buddhas, who are the best of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: de rnams kyi nang na kun mkhyen ni rdo rje 'chang chen pos so //
analyzed: de rnams kyi nang na kun mkhyen ni rdo rje 'chang chen pos so //
translated: Among them, the omniscient one is Mahāvajradhara.🔽The supreme meditation is the special samādhi that is the best of all.

original: bsgom pa mchog ni thams cad kyi phul du byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par bka' stsal ba ni gsungs so //
analyzed: bsgom pa mchog ni thams cad kyi phul du byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par bka' stsal ba ni gsungs so //
translated: The statement is the teaching.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the realm of space, and so on.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings ni snying ga ste /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings ni snying ga ste /
translated: The realm of space is the heart center.

original: de'i dbus su gnas pa ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: de'i dbus su gnas pa ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
translated: In the middle of that, abiding, is the moon maṇḍala.

original: yi ge gsum las byung ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: yi ge gsum las byung ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The moon maṇḍala that arises from the three syllables should be visualized.

original: de'i steng du sangs rgyas kyi sku ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku ste /
analyzed: de'i steng du sangs rgyas kyi sku ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku ste /
translated: On top of that, the Buddha-body is the body of Great Vajradhara.

original: ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs rnam par bsgoms shing phra mo'i rnal 'byor ni thig le bsgom pa brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs rnam par bsgoms shing phra mo'i rnal 'byor ni thig le bsgom pa brtson par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on the form of the Knowledge-Being, and should strive in the meditation of the subtle yoga, the meditation of the drop.

original: ji ltar zhe na /🔽sna'i rtse mo ni ye shes sems dpa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i sna'i rtse mor ro //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na / sna'i rtse mo ni ye shes sems dpa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i sna'i rtse mor ro //
translated: How?🔽At the tip of the nose, at the tip of the nose of the Knowledge-Being Vajra, one should meditate on the mustard-seed.

original: yungs kar ni sngags la sogs pa'i thig le bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: yungs kar ni sngags la sogs pa'i thig le bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should think of the drop of mantra, etc.

original: des ni sems dbang du bya ba yin no //
analyzed: des ni sems dbang du bya ba yin no //
translated: By that, the mind is brought under control.

original: sems dbang du bya ba bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: sems dbang du bya ba bstan par bya ste /
translated: The mind being brought under control should be taught.

original: 'gro dang mi 'gro yungs kar de la bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: 'gro dang mi 'gro yungs kar de la bsgom par bya ste /
translated: One should meditate on the moving and unmoving in that mustard-seed.

original: de'i rang bzhin bsam par bya ba'am /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin bsam par bya ba'am /
translated: One should think of its nature,

original: 'gro dang mi 'gro bar der thim par bya'o //
analyzed: 'gro dang mi 'gro bar der thim par bya'o //
translated: or the moving and unmoving should dissolve into it.

original: bstan pa dang g-yo ba khyad par bstan nas /
analyzed: bstan pa dang g-yo ba khyad par bstan nas /
translated: Having taught the special characteristics of the moving and unmoving,

original: rigs lnga'i rang bzhin bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: rigs lnga'i rang bzhin bstan par bya ste /
translated: one should teach the nature of the five clans.

original: ye shes ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: Knowledge is Akshobhya.

original: gnas ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: gnas ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: Place is Vairochana.

original: nyams dga' ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: nyams dga' ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: Delight is Amitābha.

original: gsang ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
analyzed: gsang ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
translated: Secret is Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: ye shes kyi brtag pa ni don yod grub pa ste /
analyzed: ye shes kyi brtag pa ni don yod grub pa ste /
translated: Knowledge is Amoghasiddhi.

original: de rnams kyi rang bzhin du bsgom par bya ba ni bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rang bzhin du bsgom par bya ba ni bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should contemplate their nature.

original: le'u bco brgyad pa las kyang /
analyzed: le'u bco brgyad pa las kyang /
translated: Also, the eighteenth chapter says:

original: sna'i rtse mor yungs kar zhes //
analyzed: sna'i rtse mor yungs kar zhes //
translated: At the tip of the nose, mustard seed,

original: srog dang rtsol ba brtag pa ste //
analyzed: srog dang rtsol ba brtag pa ste //
translated: is the examination of prāṇa and āyāma,

original: sangs rgyas ngo bo 'od zer lnga //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ngo bo 'od zer lnga //
translated: the five light rays, the essence of the buddhas,

original: srog dang rtsol @98b la gnas pa'o //🔽zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: srog dang rtsol @98b la gnas pa'o // zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: abiding in prāṇa and āyāma.

original: 'dir ni rigs pa 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'dir ni rigs pa 'di yin te /
translated: Here is the reasoning:

original: gang zhig bde ba chen po'i ngo bo'i gzugs thig le tsam de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig bde ba chen po'i ngo bo'i gzugs thig le tsam de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: That which is the mere drop of form, the essence of great bliss, is the gnosis of the dharmadhātu, Akṣobhya.

original: gang zhig snang bar gyur pa'i gzugs ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi ngo bo ste rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: gang zhig snang bar gyur pa'i gzugs ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi ngo bo ste rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: That which is the form that has become appearance is the essence of mirror-like gnosis, Vairocana.

original: gang zhig 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi bdag nyid so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te /
analyzed: gang zhig 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi bdag nyid so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te /
translated: The wisdom of discernment is the nature of all things, both moving and unmoving.

original: de ni snang ba mtha' yas so //
analyzed: de ni snang ba mtha' yas so //
translated: That is Amitābha.

original: dbang po thams cad dang rnam par shes pa dang / khams drug po ro gcig par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid can mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin te rin chen 'byung ldan no //
analyzed: dbang po thams cad dang rnam par shes pa dang / khams drug po ro gcig par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid can mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin te rin chen 'byung ldan no //
translated: The wisdom of equality is the nature of all the sense faculties, consciousnesses, and the six elements, which have become of one taste. That is Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: gang zhig 'di 'od zer ma lus pa'i spro ba'i mtshan nyid can bya ba nan tan grub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin te don yod grub pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig 'di 'od zer ma lus pa'i spro ba'i mtshan nyid can bya ba nan tan grub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin te don yod grub pa'o //
translated: The wisdom of successful activities is the nature of the emanation of all the light rays. That is Amoghasiddhi.

original: des ni 'di bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: des ni 'di bshad pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being explained.

original: yungs kar ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: yungs kar ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rang bzhin du bsam par bya'o //
translated: Mustard seeds should be contemplated as having the nature of the five tathāgatas.

original: des ni ye shes sems dpa'i sgo nas phra mo'i rnal 'byor bstan pa'o //
analyzed: des ni ye shes sems dpa'i sgo nas phra mo'i rnal 'byor bstan pa'o //
translated: This explains the subtle yoga from the perspective of the gnosis being.

original: da ni dam tshig sems dpa'i sgo nas rigs kyi dbye bas phra mo'i rnal 'byor bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni dam tshig sems dpa'i sgo nas rigs kyi dbye bas phra mo'i rnal 'byor bshad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the subtle yoga should be explained from the perspective of the pledge being, in terms of the divisions of the buddha families.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the realm of space, etc.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings ni padma'i sna ste /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings ni padma'i sna ste /
translated: The realm of space is the lotus stalk,

original: de'i dbus su gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni rnam par rtog pa ma lus pa bsreg pa'i ngo bo dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin mi bskyod pa'i gdan du gyur pa rtsa dbus ma la bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus su gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni rnam par rtog pa ma lus pa bsreg pa'i ngo bo dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin mi bskyod pa'i gdan du gyur pa rtsa dbus ma la bsam par bya'o //
translated: and in its center, the sun mandala is the nature of the burning of all conceptual thought, and the seat of Akṣobhya, the nature of the realm of reality, is the central channel.

original: nyi ma'i gdan de nyid kyi steng du sangs rgyas kyi sku ni mi bskyod pa'i sku ste /
analyzed: nyi ma'i gdan de nyid kyi steng du sangs rgyas kyi sku ni mi bskyod pa'i sku ste /
translated: On that very sun seat, the buddha body is the body of Akṣobhya,

original: zhal gsum phyag drug pa m'a ma k'i dang snyoms par zhugs pa rnam par bsgoms te ;
analyzed: zhal gsum phyag drug pa m'a ma k'i dang snyoms par zhugs pa rnam par bsgoms te ;
translated: with three faces and six arms, in union with Māmakī, visualized.

original: de'i rjes la chags pa chen po'i mes spro ba dang bsdu ba sngon du 'gro ba 'od du zhu ba bsams la gnas ni thig le tsam du /
analyzed: de'i rjes la chags pa chen po'i mes spro ba dang bsdu ba sngon du 'gro ba 'od du zhu ba bsams la gnas ni thig le tsam du /
translated: After that, the great passion fire precedes the emanation and gathering, and one should imagine the melting into light, and the place is just a drop.

original: de'i steng du ni rtsa dbus ma'i gzhir gyur pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du ni rtsa dbus ma'i gzhir gyur pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la dgod par bya'o //
translated: On that, one should place the sun mandala, the basis of the central channel.

original: 'dir ni sngags 'di yin te /
analyzed: 'dir ni sngags 'di yin te /
translated: Here is the mantra:

original: h'um sngags 'di brjod nas sna'i rtse mor thig le bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: h'um sngags 'di brjod nas sna'i rtse mor thig le bsam par bya'o //
translated: Having recited this hūṃ mantra, one should imagine a drop at the tip of the nose.

original: de'i rang bzhin thig le yin no zhes kha cig 'dod do //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin thig le yin no zhes kha cig 'dod do //
translated: Some assert that its nature is a drop.

original: la la na re de'i ye shes sems dpa'i sngags kyi thig le de'i rnam pa yin no zhes zer ro //🔽lte ba'i mi bskyod pa gtso bor gyur pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgoms la rnam par snang mdzad la @99a * //
analyzed: la la na re de'i ye shes sems dpa'i sngags kyi thig le de'i rnam pa yin no zhes zer ro // lte ba'i mi bskyod pa gtso bor gyur pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgoms la rnam par snang mdzad la @99a * //
translated: Others say that it is the form of the drop of mantra of the gnosis being.

original: sogs pa'i gtso bor gyur pa bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sogs pa'i gtso bor gyur pa bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Having meditated on the subtle yoga with Akṣobhya at the navel as the principal deity, in order to explain Vairocana, etc., as the principal deity,

original: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares the realm of space, etc.

original: snga ma bzhin du padma'i sna'i nub phyogs su rtsa lha sbyin ma'i dbus su gnas pa gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams te /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du padma'i sna'i nub phyogs su rtsa lha sbyin ma'i dbus su gnas pa gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams te /
translated: As before, in the west of the lotus nose, in the center of the nāḍī deity giver, one should imagine a clear maṇḍala, a moon maṇḍala.

original: spyan gyi tshul du sbyor ba la //
analyzed: spyan gyi tshul du sbyor ba la //
translated: The union in the manner of Locanā

original: zhes bya ba ni lha mo spyan dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i rtag pa bsgoms te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lha mo spyan dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i rtag pa bsgoms te /
translated: is the meditation on the constant union with the goddess Locanā.

original: rdo rje padma ni de dag gis bde ba chen po nyams su myong bas ji srid chags pa'i mes zhu zhing snga ma bzhin du thig le tsam du de nyid bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje padma ni de dag gis bde ba chen po nyams su myong bas ji srid chags pa'i mes zhu zhing snga ma bzhin du thig le tsam du de nyid bsgom par bya ste /
translated: The vajra and lotus are melted by the fire of passion through their experience of great bliss, and one should meditate on that as a mere drop, as before.

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor ba'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor ba'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro //
translated: This is the subtle yoga of a practitioner of Vairochana.

original: de bzhin du nam mkha'i dbyings ni padma'i dbus su gnas pa'i g-yas phyogs su rtsa rus sbal ma la rin chen dkyil 'khor ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gdan du gyur pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du nam mkha'i dbyings ni padma'i dbus su gnas pa'i g-yas phyogs su rtsa rus sbal ma la rin chen dkyil 'khor ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gdan du gyur pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom ste /
translated: Similarly, in the center of the lotus located in the realm of space, to the right of the side channel, one should meditate on the channel tortoise, the jewel mandala, which is the seat of Ratnasambhava, as a sun mandala.

original: de'i steng du dang po sbyor ba ste dang po sbyor ba la sogs pa'i rim pas 'byung ba rang gi lha mo dang snyoms par zhugs pa rin chen 'byung ldan nan tan gyis ni yang snga ma bzhin du zhu ba bsams te /
analyzed: de'i steng du dang po sbyor ba ste dang po sbyor ba la sogs pa'i rim pas 'byung ba rang gi lha mo dang snyoms par zhugs pa rin chen 'byung ldan nan tan gyis ni yang snga ma bzhin du zhu ba bsams te /
translated: On that, one should imagine the union of Ratnasambhava with his consort, Locana, through the stages of the first union and so on, and then the melting of Ratnasambhava through the power of his concentration, as before.

original: de nyid tsam du bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid tsam du bsgom par bya ste /
translated: One should meditate on that as a mere drop.

original: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rnal 'byor ba'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rnal 'byor ba'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro //
translated: This is the subtle yoga of the practitioner of Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: de bzhin du nam mkha'i dbyings ni padma nyid kyi dbus su g-yon phyogs su rtsa zla ba ma la 'od zer gtso bor gyur pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams te /
analyzed: de bzhin du nam mkha'i dbyings ni padma nyid kyi dbus su g-yon phyogs su rtsa zla ba ma la 'od zer gtso bor gyur pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams te /
translated: Similarly, in the middle of a lotus in the realm of space, on the left side, in the moon channel, one should imagine a moon disk, with light rays,

original: de'i steng du sangs rgyas tshul ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi sku zhi ba'i ngo bo 'khor gos dkar mo dang bcas par bsams te /
analyzed: de'i steng du sangs rgyas tshul ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi sku zhi ba'i ngo bo 'khor gos dkar mo dang bcas par bsams te /
translated: and on top of that, the form of Buddha Amitābha, the nature of peace, together with the retinue of Pāṇḍaravāsinī.

original: khyad par ni snga ma bzhin du 'od du zhu ba de nyid la thig le tsam du bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: khyad par ni snga ma bzhin du 'od du zhu ba de nyid la thig le tsam du bsgom par bya ste /
translated: The difference is that, as before, one should meditate on the mere drop of the melted light.

original: snang ba mtha' yas kyi rnal 'byor ba'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: snang ba mtha' yas kyi rnal 'byor ba'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro //
translated: This is the subtle yoga of the practitioner of Amitābha.

original: de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi rtsa la autpala mthing ga'i mdog 'dra ba zhes pa ni don yod grub pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi rtsa la autpala mthing ga'i mdog 'dra ba zhes pa ni don yod grub pa ste /
translated: Similarly, in the eastern channel, the color of a blue lotus, is Amoghasiddhi,

original: rtse mo lnga pa ni rigs lnga nye bar sdud par byed pa lha mo sgrol ma dang snyoms par zhugs pa /
analyzed: rtse mo lnga pa ni rigs lnga nye bar sdud par byed pa lha mo sgrol ma dang snyoms par zhugs pa /
translated: with five points, who is in union with the goddess Tārā, who is the gatherer of the five families.

original: khyad par du zhes pa ni 'od du zhu zhing thig le tsam gyi ngo bo nas kyi 'bru tsam zhes pa tshad de nyid kyis nye bar mtshon pa sna'i rtse mor ni rtsa nor rgyal ma de nyid la bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: khyad par du zhes pa ni 'od du zhu zhing thig le tsam gyi ngo bo nas kyi 'bru tsam zhes pa tshad de nyid kyis nye bar mtshon pa sna'i rtse mor ni rtsa nor rgyal ma de nyid la bsam par bya ste /
translated: In particular means that the nature of the drop, which has melted into light, is the size of a sesame seed, and at the tip of the nose means that one should imagine that very channel, the rasanā, at the tip of the nose.

original: las kyi rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: las kyi rigs kyi rnal 'byor pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro //
translated: This is the subtle yoga of the practitioner of the karma family.

original: padma'i @99b sna'i rtse mor thig le bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: padma'i @99b sna'i rtse mor thig le bsgom par bya ste /
translated: One should meditate on the drop at the tip of the lotus nose.🔽In order to explain the vajra,

original: rdo rje la yang bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rdo rje la yang bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: it is said,

original: tsa na ka yi 'bru tsam la //
analyzed: tsa na ka yi 'bru tsam la //
translated: the size of a mustard seed,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: and so forth.

original: rdo rje bu ga'i nang du /
analyzed: rdo rje bu ga'i nang du /
translated: In the interior of the vajra

original: 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas //
analyzed: 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas //
translated: is an eight-petaled lotus with a pistil.

original: zhes pa ni snga ma bzhin du rtsa g-yon pa la tsa na ka'i 'bru'i tshad tsam bsams te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni snga ma bzhin du rtsa g-yon pa la tsa na ka'i 'bru'i tshad tsam bsams te /
translated: As before, one should imagine a channel the size of a mustard seed in the left channel.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa snang ba mtha' yas snga ma bzhin du 'od du zhu ba kha dog lnga pa thig le'i ngo bo byang chub gzhol bar gyur pa ni snang ba mtha' yas rnal 'byor bas bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa snang ba mtha' yas snga ma bzhin du 'od du zhu ba kha dog lnga pa thig le'i ngo bo byang chub gzhol bar gyur pa ni snang ba mtha' yas rnal 'byor bas bsam par bya ste /
translated: That completely transforms into Amitābha as before, melting into light, five-colored, the essence of a drop, and one should imagine it as the destination of enlightenment, by the yoga of Amitābha.

original: snang ba mtha' yas kyi rnal 'byor ba'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro //
analyzed: snang ba mtha' yas kyi rnal 'byor ba'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor ro //
translated: This is the subtle yoga of the yoga of Amitābha.

original: 'khor lo la sogs pa khyad par du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'khor lo la sogs pa khyad par du zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The special wheel and so on are as follows:

original: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje'i rtse mang de nyid g-yas dang shar dang nub dang dbus rnams su 'khor lo la sogs par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje'i rtse mang de nyid g-yas dang shar dang nub dang dbus rnams su 'khor lo la sogs par bsam par bya ste /
translated: As before, one should imagine that very tip of the vajra as the wheel and so on in the right, east, west, and center.

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should cultivate the subtle yoga of the yoga of Vairocana and so on.

original: de ltar byas nas byang chub grub par gyur pa ni mi bskyod par 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar byas nas byang chub grub par gyur pa ni mi bskyod par 'gyur pa'o //
translated: Having done that, the accomplishment of enlightenment is Akṣobhya.

original: gnas ni rin chen 'byung ldan grub po //
analyzed: gnas ni rin chen 'byung ldan grub po //
translated: The abode is the accomplishment of Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: nyams dga' ba ni snang ba mtha' yas grub bo //
analyzed: nyams dga' ba ni snang ba mtha' yas grub bo //
translated: The delightful is the accomplishment of Amitābha.

original: dngos grub thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad grub po //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad grub po //
translated: All powers are the accomplishment of Vairocana.

original: yon tan ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams kyi gnas ni gdon mi za ba grub ste /
analyzed: yon tan ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las rnams kyi gnas ni gdon mi za ba grub ste /
translated: The qualities are the abode of the activities of pacification, etc., which are certainly accomplished.

original: dngos grub de rnams lnga po rnal 'byor bas 'grub par 'gyur zhes tshig gi don to //
analyzed: dngos grub de rnams lnga po rnal 'byor bas 'grub par 'gyur zhes tshig gi don to //
translated: The meaning of the words is that those five powers are accomplished by the yogī.

original: rang gi sems dbang du byas la /
analyzed: rang gi sems dbang du byas la /
translated: Having brought one’s mind under control,

original: gzhan gyi don grub par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don grub par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to accomplish the welfare of others,

original: sangs rgyas byang chub ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: the Bhagavān declares, “the enlightenment of the buddhas,” and so on.

original: mdor na zhes pa cig car du sangs rgyas ni rigs lnga'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
analyzed: mdor na zhes pa cig car du sangs rgyas ni rigs lnga'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
translated: In brief, the buddhas are the tathāgatas of the five families.

original: de dag byang chub ni rang rang gi shes rab ma ste de rnams kyi bha gar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de dag byang chub ni rang rang gi shes rab ma ste de rnams kyi bha gar gnas pa'o //
translated: Their enlightenment is their respective prajñās, who abide in their bhagas.

original: de bzhin du chos ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rang bzhin dang / gnas ni don yod grub pa'i rigs can dang / sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rigs can du de rnams spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du chos ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rang bzhin dang / gnas ni don yod grub pa'i rigs can dang / sku gsung thugs kyis mtshan pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rigs can du de rnams spro bar bya'o //
translated: Likewise, the Dharma is the nature of Ratnasaṃbhava, the abode is the family of Amoghasiddhi, and the one who is marked with body, speech, and mind is the family of Vairocana, etc.

original: yang na rtsa lnga rtse mo de rnams kyi gang zhig thig le de rnams bsgom pa de dag sangs rgyas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin te /🔽byang chub gnas pa ni rtsa @100a * //
analyzed: yang na rtsa lnga rtse mo de rnams kyi gang zhig thig le de rnams bsgom pa de dag sangs rgyas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin te / byang chub gnas pa ni rtsa @100a * //
translated: Alternatively, the five channels are the peaks of those, and the drops that are cultivated there are the buddhas, the nature of the tathāgatas.

original: dbus ma la ro gcig par gyur pa nyid du bya'o //
analyzed: dbus ma la ro gcig par gyur pa nyid du bya'o //
translated: The abode of enlightenment is the central channel, which is to be made into a single taste.

original: de byas nas sku la sogs pa'i rigs can gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de nyid las spro bar bya ste rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de byas nas sku la sogs pa'i rigs can gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de nyid las spro bar bya ste rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: Having done that, the tathāgatas of the family of body, etc., are emanated from that, which is the completion stage.🔽The stage of offering

original: phra mo'i rnal 'byor gyi 'og rol tu mchod pa'i rim pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: phra mo'i rnal 'byor gyi 'og rol tu mchod pa'i rim pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: The stage of offering should be explained after the yoga of the subtle.

original: mchod pa de yang rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: mchod pa de yang rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: That offering is also threefold:

original: gsang ba'i mchod pa dang / de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa dang / mchod pa chen po'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i mchod pa dang / de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa dang / mchod pa chen po'o //
translated: the secret offering, the offering of reality, and the great offering.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, etc.

original: rdo rje ni rigs pa'i rdo rje ste /
analyzed: rdo rje ni rigs pa'i rdo rje ste /
translated: The vajra is the vajra of reasoning.

original: de 'dzin ni padma'i nang du zhugs par mdzad pas na rdo rje 'dzin te rgyu'o //
analyzed: de 'dzin ni padma'i nang du zhugs par mdzad pas na rdo rje 'dzin te rgyu'o //
translated: The holder of that is the vajra holder, the cause, because he is engaged in the lotus.

original: rdo rje ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te de 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin te 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te de 'dzin pas na rdo rje 'dzin te 'bras bu'o //
translated: The vajra is the intuition of the reality limit, and the holder of that is the vajra holder, the result, because he is engaged in the lotus.

original: rdo rje bdud rtsi ni lcags kyu rnams te de 'dzin pa ni spyod par byed pas na 'dzin te sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi ni lcags kyu rnams te de 'dzin pa ni spyod par byed pas na 'dzin te sgrub pa'o //
translated: Vajra nectar is the hooks, and the holder of that is the vajra holder, the practice, because he is engaged in the lotus.

original: dpal ni rang snang ba'i shes rab ma ste /
analyzed: dpal ni rang snang ba'i shes rab ma ste /
translated: Glory is the self-manifesting wisdom woman.

original: de gang la yod pa de ni dpal ldan te rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de gang la yod pa de ni dpal ldan te rang bzhin no //
translated: He who has that is the glorious one, the nature.

original: dpal ni ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ste /
analyzed: dpal ni ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ste /
translated: Glory is the perfection of intuition.

original: de gang la yod pa ste rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de gang la yod pa ste rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: He who has that is the glorious one, the perfection stage.

original: dpal ni bdud rtsi myong ba ste de gang la yod pa ste sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: dpal ni bdud rtsi myong ba ste de gang la yod pa ste sgrub pa'o //
translated: Glory is the experience of nectar, and he who has that is the glorious one, the practice.

original: kun ni gsang ba'i mchod pa dang / don ni mchod pa chen pos te /
analyzed: kun ni gsang ba'i mchod pa dang / don ni mchod pa chen pos te /
translated: All means the secret offering and the great offering.

original: de rnams ston par mdzad pas na /
analyzed: de rnams ston par mdzad pas na /
translated: Since he is the one who teaches those,

original: de nyid don kun ston pa pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid don kun ston pa pa'o //
translated: he is the one who reveals all objects.

original: spyod pa kun ni rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: spyod pa kun ni rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: All conduct is of three types:

original: spros pa dang bcas pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / shin tu spros pa med pa rnams so /
analyzed: spros pa dang bcas pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / shin tu spros pa med pa rnams so /
translated: with elaboration, without elaboration, and with extremely unelaborate conduct.

original: mchog ni de dag gi phul du byung ba'o //
analyzed: mchog ni de dag gi phul du byung ba'o //
translated: Supreme means that which is the best of those.

original: legs dag pa ni byang chub chen po'i go 'phang thob pa'o //
analyzed: legs dag pa ni byang chub chen po'i go 'phang thob pa'o //
translated: Well purified means that one has attained the stage of great enlightenment.🔽The sublime secret is the three kinds of offerings.

original: gsang ba dam pa ni mchod pa rnam pa gsum rdo rje 'dzin des bka' stsal to zhes ston to //
analyzed: gsang ba dam pa ni mchod pa rnam pa gsum rdo rje 'dzin des bka' stsal to zhes ston to //
translated: The vajra holder has taught that.

original: gzugs dang sgra dang ro ldan pa //
analyzed: gzugs dang sgra dang ro ldan pa //
translated: Possessing form, sound, and taste,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la //
translated: and so on.

original: drug ces pa ni drug gi grangs dang ldan pa zla ba ni zla ba re re la me tog 'byung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: drug ces pa ni drug gi grangs dang ldan pa zla ba ni zla ba re re la me tog 'byung ba'i phyir /
translated: Six means possessing the number six. The moon is the moon because flowers arise every month.

original: zla ba drug ni rigs drug las byung ba'i lha mo gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: zla ba drug ni rigs drug las byung ba'i lha mo gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa ste /
translated: The six months are the goddesses arising from the six families, such as Rūpavajrā.

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya ma rnams bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya ma rnams bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on the pledge seal women.

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: By what?

original: gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan pas so //
analyzed: gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan pas so //
translated: By possessing the qualities of desire, form, sound, and so on.

original: gzhan ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What else?

original: shes rab ba can gyi ni phyag rgya ma de rnams dang ldan pas gal te bsgom pa ni sngar bshad pa'i rim pas snyoms par zhugs @100b par byed na de'i tshe rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid du 'gyur zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: shes rab ba can gyi ni phyag rgya ma de rnams dang ldan pas gal te bsgom pa ni sngar bshad pa'i rim pas snyoms par zhugs @100b par byed na de'i tshe rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid du 'gyur zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: If one who possesses the wisdom seal women meditates on them, by the process previously explained, then at that time one becomes Great Vajradhara.

original: de'i rang bzhin dang rgyu dang las dang 'bras bu dang / gsang ba'i mchod pa dang / spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa rnams so //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin dang rgyu dang las dang 'bras bu dang / gsang ba'i mchod pa dang / spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa rnams so //
translated: This has five parts: nature, cause, effect, secret worship, and conduct with elaboration.

original: yang na zla ba drug ni bshang gci la sogs pa lnga dang lcags kyu lnga gcig ste drug go //
analyzed: yang na zla ba drug ni bshang gci la sogs pa lnga dang lcags kyu lnga gcig ste drug go //
translated: Or else, the six months are the five of feces, urine, and so on, and the one of the five hooks, making six.

original: de rnams gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan pa ni sbyang ba la sogs pa'i rim pas dri ma med par byas te /
analyzed: de rnams gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan pa ni sbyang ba la sogs pa'i rim pas dri ma med par byas te /
translated: The one who is endowed with the Tathāgatas who are the nature of form and so forth, having made them stainless by the process of purification and so forth,

original: shes rab can ni smod pa med pa'i rnal 'byor pas gal te spyod par byed na de'i tshe rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid du 'gyur ro zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: shes rab can ni smod pa med pa'i rnal 'byor pas gal te spyod par byed na de'i tshe rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid du 'gyur ro zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
